sourceDesc.p: ସାରଳା ମହାଭାରତ: Sāraḷā Dāsa's Mahābhār, Arttaballabha Mohant, vol. 4, part. 2

projectDesc.p: The edition was scanned in 2008 at Leiden University by Arlo Griffiths with the help of his assistant Shila Schoots. Based on these scans, the edition was rekeyed 2009 by typists based in South India whose work was coordinated by Thomas Malten. The work was done at the time with a low budget furnished by Arlo Griffiths and left a lot to be desired. It has remained dormant for nearly 15 years and has now (Febr. 2024) started to be gradually cleaned up.

lg.l:
mukhya saṁkaḷaka, saṁgrāhaka o saṁpādaka:
ḍakṭara (?) ārttaballabha mahānti, em. e, ḍi. liṭ., padmaśrī
lg.head: [kha]
biṣaẏa pr̥ṣṭhāṅka
lg.l:
10| naḷaṅkara ayodhyāre prabeśa o bāhuta
sārathi nāma dhāraṇa ... 273

12| bhīmara banare bihāra o
kāḷañchi rākṣasī sahita bandhabong bibāha ... 340

14nakuḷara satyaniṣṭhā darśane rebā
daityara puraskāra ebong batsāharaṇa
dose brahmāṅka apūjya abhiśāpa ... 361

div.head: {@sacaḷā haraṇa@}

lg.l: citrasena gandhabong yāithilā madhya ye bmabanu | 1 |
pūjābidhi kari baibasuta manu ye boilā
bāsabara putra kimpe mr̥tu maṇḍaḷe thilā | 2 |
agastiẏe boile śuṇa pūbongra ye kathā
āho satyayuge baiśākha māsa śukḷapakṣa tr̥tīẏāra tithi
rohiṇī nakṣatra ye bāra aṭai br̥haspati | 4 |
yugādya tithi ye se basanta utsaba yāta
śaraguṇā bādya gheniṇa se karucchi gāẏana | 7 |

div.note: trilocanara putra se citra ye bāhana |–ḍa, gha

lg.l: haraṣe indra debatā tāhākaiṁ dileka tāmboḷe | 8 |
adhare sukhante se kalā tāmboḷa bhmakatā | 9 |
āho caitana priẏarasa bhoḷe bidyādhara tāmboḷa bhmañji
gaha gaha śabada timburu rasa bāṇī
padabandha sāri ubhā hoilā brahmāṁka chāmure
ẏe deba āstāne mote pakāilu utiṣṭha | 15 |
yāa tumr̥tu maṇḍaḷe jāta huasi śūkara
ẏehi mukhare ture biṣṭhā karasi āhāra | 16 |
kiñchita doṣaku dhātā dilu bahuta śāsti | 17 |
tohora bacane kari muṁ pāibi bahuta dukha
kāraṇa kahibā mote kete dine hoibi mokṣa | 18 |
āre satyayuga satara lakṣa aṭhāiśi sahasra baraṣa
tretaẏā yuga bāralakṣa chaẏāṇoi sahasra baraṣa | 19 |

div.note: surasiddha mohabaśe lāgichanti khaṭaṇi |–ḍa, da, ka, ta, tha, ṅa
surasiddha mohinī ye lāgichanti khaṭaṇi |–ca, cha, gha
nādaghāta māridilā brahmāṁka chāmure |–na, ca, cha, kha

lg.l: hoibu mokṣa tuhi caubiṁśa lakṣa cautriśa sahasra baraṣe | 21 |
śuṇa ho manupuruṣa satyayuge pitāmahara śāpye
se citrabāhāna mr̥tu maṇḍaḷe upujilā śūkara rūpe | 22 |
kāḷandī nāme nagre kāḷebara nāme bana
tahiṁ yāiṁ śūkara rūpe hoilā utapanna | 23 |
kāḷindī nadī tīraku se rātre nitye yāi cari
pitāmahara śāpye se biṣṭhā āpyāna kari | 24 |
māī śūkarī tule se kalāka abhiḷāṣa
barehā rūpe tāra hoilā apāra bongśa | 25 |

div.note:
brahmāẏe boile se bidyādhara āge
hoibu mokhya tu cautriśi sahasra baraṣa lāge–na, kha, ja, cha |

“barehā rūpe tāra hoilā apāra bongśa” ẏehi pādānta pare
‘tha’ pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
dvāpara yugare se mḷecchadeśara rājā
maṅgaḷasena boli se medinīre pūjā |
ati bicakṣaṇa se toṭāẏeka utapatti
nānā phaḷabhare se toṭāẏe śobhāpānti |
tahīṁ se śūkara nitye hoilā prabeśa
br̥kṣa bhāñji tāra toṭā sakaḷa galā nāśa |
ẏebe grīṣamarutu baiśākha māsa
bhr̥gubāra rohiṇī ye tr̥tīẏā dibasa |
satyayuge sehidinu pāithila śāpa
dvāpara yute se dine khaṇḍilā mahāpāpa |
se maṅgaḷa nāme rājāku kahile toṭāḷa nidhi
nārājare kari se śūkarakaiṁ badhi |
nārājara ghāte se chāḍilāka prāṇa
indra boilā mātaḷi puṣpeka nia ẏehikṣaṇa |

lg.l: dvāpara yuge mḷecchadeśara rājā maṅgaḷasena nr̥pati
mr̥gaẏā nimantreṇa ailā se pratāpa catrabarttī | 26 |
grīṣama rutu ye se baiśākha māsa
dvāpara yugare se dinare khaṇḍilā tāhāra pāpa | 28 |
maṅgaḷasena nr̥pati bane bulai beṇṭa pāridhi
nārāja ghāta kari se śr̥karakaiṁ binddha | 29 |
rājāra nārājeṇa tuṭilā tāra nija prāṇa
indra boile tu mātaḷi puṣkeka ratha gheni yāa ẏehikṣaṇa | 30 |
śāparu mukata yebe hoilā mohora putra
chāmura subarṇṇa bandhā śaṅkha phurai ẏekalakṣe
bimāne bidyādhara yāi bijaẏa kalā pratakṣe | 35 |
dibya abatāra hoi se tiḷottamāra tanu | 37 |
sacaḷā nāme kanyā tāhāra piara banamāḷī | 40 |
lakṣeka paribāra gheni se sacaḷā sundarī
dvārakāuṁ bāhāra hoilā kṣīrodre srāhāna kari | 41 |
yāānteṇa sundarī jaḷe dekhilā tāra chāẏā
urddhamukha kari ākāśaku chāhaṁi se śrīkr̥ṣṇa tanaẏā | 43 |
mātaḷiki boilā bimāna mora kara bhūmigate
dvārikā nikaṭa hoiṇa se bāsudebara kati | 47 |
citrasena boilā ẏe yogāi amara bhmabanaku
prāpata hoilā drabya ẏe na chāḍai muku | 48 |
dhātikāre ratha nei kalāka sindhu kūḷe

div.note: citrabahana gandhabong sannidhye yāiṁ miḷi |–gha, ḍa, da, ṭa, ca, cha |
citrasena dekhi tāku madanamate ḍhaḷi |–gha, ṭha |
citrasena madhya madanarase paḍe ḍhaḷi |–ṭha, ḍa, da, ta, ja |
prāpata hoibā drabya chāḍibi kisaku |–cha, kha, na

lg.l: stirī ratna nāẏekā se jagata mohinī
prabeśa hoilā yāi citrasena amara pure
dhātikāre prabeśa hoile se dvārābatī purī | 56 |
āstāna upare ye bijaẏe rājā ugasena
raibrata parabate bije basantautsaba yātrā bidhāna | 57 |
yahubongśa bhojabongśa chohāṇabongśa āstāna taḷe chanti paṭuārī | 60 |
aneka trodha abastāẏe se kahanti sundarī | 61 |
āstāna uparu bege ye uṭhigalāka sātukī
gobinde boile tu na kaha baḷarāmaṁku
gobinde boile ho ẏe kebaṇa bichāra
amara bhmabanakuiṁ hari daṇḍa bege sāja | 72 |
bidyādhara ādikari ke rakṣākarai āja abā | 73 |
āna indra sthāpibaiṁ satya satya kali muhiṁ | 74 |

lg.note: balebara = balaāma |
lg.l: bāsaba na jāṇai abā citrasena nelā hari
pitāṁku na kahi se thoilā gopyakari | 76 |
bho deba nīḷāmbara indrakaiṁ kopa kara
bāratā pāiṇa yebe indra na āṇaiṁ kumārī
tebe se nāśa karibā amara svargapurī | 79 |
ẏete boli rāmaṁku samārjile śrīpuruṣa uttama
boile tumbhe duheṁ yāa ho amara svargapurī | 81 |
sabhāre yāiṇa tumbhe ye kahiba sabong bidyamāne | 82 |
se dina basanta ucchaba ya trāra bidhāne
brahmā rudra indra candra kubera baruṇa tridaśa debatāgaṇamāne | 85 |
pabana tapana asita bhr̥gu ye kaśyape
yama anaḷa grahagaṇe samaste achanti samīpe | 86 |
nārade dharichanti sa raṅga sapatasvara beṇī
puṣpyeka ārohi yāiṁ miḷile amara sabhāra | 88 |
āstāne thāi tāṁku dekhile purandara svāmī | 89 |
nārade nr̥tya ruhāile sa tukīki dekhi
kisa arthe mādhabi tu bijekalu ẏethiki | 90 |
tahuṁ āstānara tni pābacchara taḷe pariṇāmi
keuṁṇa kāraṇe ẏethe ho gabana tumbhara | 92 |
boile deba maghabānaṁku kahiba tumbhe yāiṁ
indra boile ho ẏe keuṁṇa carita
keuṁṇa anyāẏa āmbhar adekhile hari haḷahātha | 96 |
bho svāmī śrī jagannāthaṁkara bhāriyā jambobatī nārī | 97 |
citrasena gandhabong tāhākaiṁ āṇilāka baḷe hari | 99 |
daṇḍa sāja boli āgyāṁ dile debahaḷī
kanyāgoṭi āmbha tule samarpaṇa kara ho maghabāna | 102 |
indra debatā biṣāda hoilā tāhā śuṇi
kare karatāḷa dei hasile īśvara debarāja | 104 |
brahmāẏe boile svāmī tu ta jagatara guru
ẏe mahāsabhāẏe basi tu kiṁpe hāsyakaru | 105 |
āmbhara bichārakaiṁ ẏe kathā baḍāi dulabha
yugate bichāre yebe samarpibā śrīhari kumārī
baḍāi durāpada kathā lāgalā bhāḷuachuṁ āmbhe
batiśa sahasra kanyā se harilā baḷātakāre | 110 |
bāṇāsura gharu uṣāku harilā tāra nāti | 112 |
āpaṇe thāiṁṇa se ẏethakaiṁ kaḷi bhiāilā

lg.note: baḷarāma kopakale svarga hoiba bhaganasta |–ta, tha
balarāma kopakale svargahoiba nāśāṁgata |–ṅa, ṭa

lg.l: mohora tule aneka dvandva ye lagāi | 115 |
mohora dekhante ṇāsurara naaśa aṭhāṇoi bhmaja chedi pakāilā | 116 |
samodra manthanuṁ jāta hoilā pārijātaka taru
samaste boile āmbha bola na kala se ẏekā
se pārijāta taru nei ropilā dvārikā | 119 |
āre āre sātukī tumbhe parastirī haripāra
tumbhe pārijātaka harila citrasena harilā tumbhara kumārī
pārijātaka pāiṁ ye sacaḷā pālaṭā kumārī | 121 |
na puṇa indraku rakṣākari nuārai śūḷapāṇi | 122 |
īśvara boile tu kaha bege yāiṁ
āmbhara tahiṁki se sāji āsantu benibhāi | 123 |
āsantu ki nāhe se kete daṇḍa bāhi | 124 |
satukī boilā svāmī tumbhe kahuacha ẏebe

lg.note:
īśvara boile kaha yā āsantu beni bhāi
muhiṁ samara karibi ẏekā bāsabara pāiṁ |–ta, da, dha, ca, ja
lg.l: īśvare boile kaha yāi kr̥ṣṇa baḷebara
inda debatā pāiṁ samara hoi(?) mohora | 127 |
svāmī apāra pratagyāṁ se kahile biśvanāthe
boile daṇḍa gheni āsantu rāmakr̥ṣṇa benibhrāthe | 130 |
boile ẏe ghānti se samara kutūhoḷa hoiba sarūpa
se citrasena bhāñjilā re tumbhar ahāde darpa | 131 |
āre ẏebe kimpe sahi nuārila ẏekā kanyāgoṭi
bāṇāsura pure mohora tule samara kalāṭi | 132 |
īśvare boile se tumbhe ye harila kusuma pārijāta
tahīṁki pālaṭi hoilā se sacaḷā duhita | 133 |
svāmī samasta debatāẏe sabhāre chanti basi
āho caitana ẏemantara samaẏe indr aye debatā
indra debatā boile svāmī śuṇimā śūḷadhārī
amara nāśayibe mora baḷebare kope kari | 138 |
lg.note:
ẏebe kimpe sahi nuāra ẏekakanyāku duṣṭamati
na sahile yuddha karantu āsi se beni bhāiṭi |–pāṭhantara

lg.l: tridaśa debatāẏe āmbhe hoiluṁ tora kati | 140 |
baiśvānaraṁka bacana abā ke pāriba meṇṭi | 143 |
hoiluṁ ẏekatr̥ āmbhe tridaśa koṭi debā
kisa kariba se hari, bahuta hoi bāsudeba ẏekā | 145 |
svāmī bedabara jiṇi pāribā ṭiki kr̥ṣṇa kāmapāla | 146 |
se āmbhanta jiṇi nuāribe āmbheheṁ tāhānta nuāribā jiṇi
ẏe duibaḷa sama hoiba boile kuśapāṇi | 149 |
ẏekā jaṇeka acchi dui balara ye madhye
se yāhā katiki yāi se jiṇipārai yuddhe | 150 |
lg.note:
yebe pāribā tebe karibā samara
jiṇi nuārile kimpe karibā kandaḷa |–ḍa, ṭha

lg.l: se kebaṇa puruṣa kaha muṁ pāribi ṭiki āṇi | 151 |
se rāmakr̥ṣṇa āmbheṭi tetiśa koṭi debagaṇe
tāhāra māhimāṁ se jībanahiṁ dhanī dhanī
sādhu tāhāra piara sādhu tāhāra jananī | 53 |
dhātāẏe boile se pārthiba bongśe jāta
koinṭāṁkara nandana se tohora bīryye saṁmbhūta | 154 |
nibongā kapaca niśodhana khāṇḍaba bana dahana
agnidebatāmkara ludubudu byādhi chaḍāilā yeuṁṇa arajuna | 155 |
ẏe mohora putra thāuṁ kāhāku mora bhīti | 156 |
se mo sadaputra āu bhaẏa ki mohora
caurāśi beḷa mote nibongātakapaca dilā dhāḍi
satya tretā beniyuge nohili muṁ tāku sari | 158 |
arjuna jāta hoilā āsi dvāpara yuge
nibongātakapacaku badha kalā ẏe mohora rāge | 159 |
se putrara prasanne muṁ amare sahasrākṣa | 160 |
mama ātmā dei se putra jāta kaẏe
boilā mātaḷiki gheni tumbhe yāa ho nārada | 162 |
lg.note: satya tretaẏā dvāpare nohili muṁ sari |–ka, tha, ja, jha

lg.l: tumbhanta mātaḷi dekhile āsiba bahana mora śiṣi | 164 |
āho candra debatāẏe ye āstāne basithile
ẏekā nārāẏaṇa prasāde muṁ jiṇili sabunti | 168 |
ẏeteka mane bichāri se deba śaśadhara
candra debatā kahile bahuta debatāṁkara kathā
yudubongśa gheni katike hoibe kr̥ṣṇa baḷadebe | 174 |
āmbhe yebe jiṇi pāribā tāhāṁku sāṁgrāme
hāribā boile muṁ karibaiṁ hāde sāmye | 175 |
brahmāẏe boile ohobaḷa madhye achai ẏekājaṇe
se yāhā katiki yiba jiṇima sehu raṇe | 176 |
āho indra tohora se putra ye bāsudebare pīrati
arjuna yāhāra kariki yāi se jiṇima sabunti | 177 |
pitā mukhuṁ ẏesaneka bacana śuṇiṇa debaindra
pāṇḍabe achanti ye gokarṇṇikā baitaraṇī tīrthe
bābu padmana bahana hoi yibu tu gokarṇṇikā tīrthaku
puṣyeka rathe basāi āṇibu tu pāthaku | 181 |
se mohora prāṇara sakhā aṭai phālaguni
se mohora prāṇara sakhā aṭai phālaguni
beḷe beḷe dvārikā mo sehu rakhiacchi | 184 |
bahana padmana re āsa tāku gheni | 185 |
svāmīra āgyāṁẏe se mīna ye ketana
uḍai bibāna tāra ye ākāśara mārge
prabeśa kāmadeba yāi baitaraṇī nadī pacchima bhāge | 187 |
basana kuṇḍaḷa ratnamāḷa dei kale pādapūjā
yujheṣṭhi debe boile āja mora jībana suphaḷa
tumbhanta bheṭili ye pabitra helā mora kuḷa | 191 |
nārade boile bābu bratiacha ṭiki bhale
sebā kariachanti nā tote bhagatira bhāba | 194 |
kṣamā daẏā dhārmika hoi ghenithibu se prakr̥ti | 195 |
ẏe banabāsaku bābu na karasi tu kicchi cintā
ẏe banabāsa mote prāpata hou ye sarbathā | 198 |
dekha mohora tule chanti aṭhāśi sahasra ruṣi
janmara sārthaka tīrtha goṭiẏe yebe kari
pitr̥kāryya karibi muhiṁ sakaḷa tīrtha bāñchi | 201 |
āho nārada yujheṣṭhira kathā hoibāra samaẏe
jhāḷeṇa tripaṇḍa ye śarīra bhumiraja dhūḷi | 205 |
mastake hātha deiṇa aneka tusti boli
yujheṣṭhi debe boile bābu yāare nakuḷa
yujheṣṭha boile kṣame acchi nā dvārikā
chāmure padmana kahilā samasta kuśaḷa boli
svāmī arajuna ṭhākure dvārikā yibe ẏehikṣaṇa | 213 |
yujheṣṭhi debe boile yadyapi aile padmana
padunaku pachārile kebaṇa kāraṇa tu jāṇuṭi kire bābu
padmana boile deba arjuna ṭhākuraṁkara gale

div.note: basreṇa kardana pochai śambara airi |–ja, ka, tha, cha
mukhare cumbana dei bhiḍai tāku |–gha, ḍa, ḍha, ja

lg.l: yujheṣṭhi debe boile śuṇa ho sahadeba
keuṁṇa nimante arjune nemāku peṣile padmanaku, bāsudeba | 217 |
bābu daita dānabaṁkara āmbhe aṭu ye bairi
āmbhanta hiraṇyakapaca nelāṭi chadrama rūpa dhari | 218 |
ẏehā parighāi bujhi kahani re bāpa | 219 |
kāli ẏetebeḷe citrasena gandhabong nelā tāku hari | 221 |
tridaśa debatānta gheni samara baribe asakanda | 222 |
tahiṁra nimante ye padmanaku dile paṭhiāi
se nimante ailā padmana arjuna ṭhākuraṁku nei | 223 |
nārade karatāḷi dei boile śuṇa ho yujheṣṭhira
bābu aneka binoẏī hoi kahichanti maghabāna
nibongātakapaca māri amare mote thāpilā arajuna | 225 |
ẏe samaẏe putra kiṁke chāḍiba mohori | 226 |
bahana yibā dhanurjaẏe bijekara puṣyeka ye rathe | 227 |

div.note: tumbhe mahāmantrī kaha ẏethira sanddha gopya |–ḍa, ḍha
ẏe parama tattu bujhi kahani ra bāpa |–ka, cha
nibongātakapaca māri svarga thāpilā phālagunya |–ja, cha, tha, ta, ka, ca

lg.l: bāṣaṭhī kṣauṇī sanyabaḷa gheni gosiṁha yāuthilā |
asura baḷa niśodhana kari āṇilā śatrābatī
teḍe baḍa āpada se ẏehāre meṇṭi
ẏeherṇṇeka samaẏe ki āmbhanta chāḍiba kiraṭi | 233 |
ẏemanta boli peṣile ye jagannātha deba svāmī
svāmī chāla boli arjunaku padmana pariṇāmi | 234 |
yujheṣṭha debe hoile āśrija tāhā śuṇi
bābu bahuta kaṣṭhore pitā putrajāta kaẏe
bongśaku kāraṇa karai yebe sulakṣaṇa upujāẏe | 236 |
apāṭhaka apābana putra se jāta kale
tāhāku ke āśa kariba yujheṣṭhi debe boile | 237 |

div.note:
“paharaka madhye tāhā arjuna nāśakalā”
pādānta pare ‘ta’ pāthire bhinnapāṭha –
asur abaḷa badhakari bīra pātha
śatrābatīki gheni se dvārikāku āgata
dvārikāre āsi pātha kale baḍa kīrtti
jībanyāśa śare pātha jīāiṁ sabunti

lg.l: bābu bhagīratha boli putreka sūryyabongśe utapatti
ākāśuṁ goṅgā āṇi ṣāṭhiẏe sahasra pitr̥lokanta kalāka mukati | 238 |
śatra nāśakari amaraku kalu ye ānanda | 239 |
bābu dharma udaẏa hoile hoai ẏemanta
bābu arjana, yebe tu pitā purakaiṁ yibu
yābata kāḷe tu jagannāthaṁku na pāibu | 241 |
bābu hari arjana ye saṁsāre bolanti ẏekaātmā
tohora bāhāku se āśa karanti mahātamā | 242 |
bābu ābara biśeṣe ye ailā padmana
bābu kṣatrīṁkara dharmare sohodre nohanti kicchi
tu yebe bābure bāsudebara tahiṁki yāu
yābata kāḷare pitā indra debatāku na pāu | 246 |
bhīmasena boilā deba mohora buddhiẏeka acchi
kāhāra tahimki ẏe na yāu sabongsācī | 247 |
nakuḷa boilā ẏe nohai kicchi dharma
na gale kṣatrīpaṇa dūṣaṇa dharma hoẏe nāśa | 249 |
āmbhanta rāi kimpā na kalāka icchā | 251 |
gobinde na karante ki āmbhara bacana
bhābeṇa sacaḷā kanyāku āmbhe karantu pradāna | 252 |
anīti kathā ẏehā satite ki pāri
keuṁṇa gāḍhapaṇe harilā se gobindaṁka kumārī | 255 |
sacaḷā kanyākaiṁ gheni dvārakāku yāāntu debaindre | 257 |
yemante pāra tumbhe kara ẏe kathāra sanddha
nārade boile se deba ye murāri
yadyapi sahasra guṇe mānya hoibe mora pitā
kṣaṇake na sahai muṁ kr̥ṣṇare abhagatā | 262 |

div.note: kāhiṁki nāśa yibaṭi pitāra sampradhi |–pāṭhāntara
haḷamune kapiḷāsa dhari pāranti chatrākara kari |–ka, tha, ñja

lg.l: hariṁki ye nindā karai yehu āge
ẏekā nārājake cchinnāi pakāi pārai amara bhūmi | 265 |
nārade boile indra nohai ye ẏekā
brahmā rudra yama baruṇa padmana kubera ādikari bhāṅgibe dvārikā | 266 |
arjuna boile na kahi āpaṇāra praśaṁsā
kebaḷa jagannāthaṁka āgyāṁ mohora ẏekāhiṁ bharasā | 267 |
brahmā rudra indra yama baruṇa kubera ādikari
ẏekā nārājake muṁ samasta pārai saṁhāri | 268 |
ẏe mohora pratagyāṁ ye aṭai sabongsiddha
mātaḷi boilā bābu ẏeta dusaha sandeha
indra debatāẏe kimpe hoilu ẏeteka nimoha | 270 |
yemante pāra prītikara tumbhe indra gobinda hāde beni | 271 |
īśvaraṁka bacane pitā mora nohantu bāī
niẏata beḷaku samare na thibe śūḷasāiṁ | 272 |
madhye paḍi nāśa yibeṭi pitā mohora indra mahātamā | 273 |

div.note: bāsaba sahite citrasenakaiṁ dhari āṇanti ẏehikṣaṇa |–cha, ca
tetiśi koṭi debe meḷihoi bhāñjibe dvārakā |–ca, na ,cha, kha

lg.l: nārade boile tora ẏe kathā aṭai satya
ẏekaātmā tumbhe duheṁ aṭa kr̥ṣṇa paṭha | 274 |
ẏete boli nārade arohile manapabana daṇḍa
ye yāhāra daṇḍa sāji āsanti br̥ndāarkamāne | 276 |
cañchaḷa se baḷa sāji āsanti samaste
indra debatāẏe ye achanti bāṭa chāhiṁ
tumbhe ta aila muni he arjuna mora kāhiṁ | 278 |
padmana āsiṇa arjunaku dvārikā galā gheni | 279 |
bho īśvara rāmakr̥ṣṇakaiṁ āu jiṇibā kemante | 281 |
mote āgyāṁ debā muṁ sacaḷākaiṁ yāi gheni | 282 |
jāṇi anugraha mote karibe kāhnu saṁtriṣeṇa | 283 |
ābara sanddha hoai ki bikaḷa hoile | 284 |
arjuna mahimāṁ kimpe pāsora galā tumbhari manara | 287 |
se kathāmāna ki tumbha manaru pāsera galā | 288 |
śaratroṇa beni dei tāre paśila śaraṇa | 289 |
īśvara kahile ẏe kathā aṭai ye satya
bhoḷae bhoḷānātha āmbhe aṭuṁ he yugata | 290 |
se kathāmāna chāḍi ẏebe meḷi heluṁ
samasta bibudhe tumbhe daṇḍa bege sāja | 292 |
śuṇa ho caitana yujheṣṭhi ruṣimānanta samasta ruhāi
nakuḷaku boile bābu tu rahithāa ẏethi
pradyumna tule bāhāra chāri ye pāṇḍaba | 296 |
ẏethu anantare dvārikāuṁ bāhāra yadubongśa thāṭha
caḷanti saini ye sarasvatī nadīra taṭa | 297 |
baḷadeba boile hari ākāśuṁ āsai ẏeka bimāne
ratharu ohlāi ye pāṇḍab jaṇa chāri
kr̥ṣṇa praṇapatya kale yujheṣṭhi debaṁka padmapāde
ẏe bipuḷa bhoga hāde tumbheri parasāde | 302 |
ẏebe śuṇa svamī tumbha bhāira carita
tuhi deba bidāraṇa kalu kaṁsa keśī | 306 |

div.note: yujheṣṭhiṁki dekhi nārāẏaṇa ratharu uturi |–kha, na

“yujheṣṭhiṁki dekhi nārāẏaṇa pabongtuṁ uturi”
pare “ḍa, cha, tha” pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
yujheṣṭhiṁka caraṇe praṇamya acyute
uṭha uṭha nārāẏaṇa boli bolanti dharmasute |
uṭhi karayoḍi ubhā hoile nārāẏaṇa
śrīkr̥ṣṇa caraṇe arjuna praṇamya |
nārāẏaṇa boile uṭha uṭha dhanurjaẏe
bābu bipuḷa lakṣmībhoga tohora prasāde dvārakāẏe |

bābu bipuḷa lakṣmībhoga kara hāde
akāraṇa indra mote cintai pramāde |–kha, na

“tetiśakoṭi debatā ẏekameḷa hoi” ehi pādānta
pare na, ta, ṭa ehi dui mudrita pustakare adhikā pāṭha –
āmbhara sahita indra kariba samara
tu yebe mohora sakhā trāhi bege kara |
yujheṣṭhi deba boile tumbhe śuṇimā gosāiṁ
tohora sañchita āmbhe aṭu pāñchabhāi |

lg.l: āmbhe pāñcha sahodre taba āgyāṁẏe brati
gobinde boile koṭiẏe īśvara koṭiẏe brahmā
āja samare bujhibā samasta debatāṁka gārimā | 309 |
cauda lakṣa ye yādaba baḷa saṅge gheni
yadu bhojabongśa saini ke pārai gaṇi | 313 |
harihara bongśe rājā uddhaba ye mahābīra
pandara lakṣa mukuṭabandhā yoddhā tāhāra saṅgara | 315 |
tā tule mukuṭabandhā yoddhā aśi aibrata | 317 |
tule aneka ye saina baḷa sāji

div.note:
nārade yetebeḷe maṇāiṁ kahile mote
nicaẏe samara ye hoiba khile bhagabante |–ḍha, ḍha

lg.l: mahāghora banamāḍi caḷanti br̥ṣṇa bongśa thāṭhagoṭi | 322 |
aneka pratagyāṁ ye na yāi kahaṇā
caḷanti kandare māḍi ye sāhera uchuḷi
paḷābanta dharma puruṣe na rahai yamadaṇḍa | 329 |
saunanda mūṣaḷa samarthaka haḷa yāhāra bhmaje acchi | 330 |
ātreṣaṇa mr̥tti nīḷāmbara lohitabarṇṇa yāhara śirare saptapheṇī
śaṅkha gokṣīra śuddha saṣṭika barṇṇa jāṇi | 331 |

div.note: ākāśa uchuḷuacchi bijaẏa ghorabākya śuṇi |–pāṭhāntara
indra uparaku boli tahiṁ thāṭa caḷabanti |–ja, ḍa, ḍha
śuddha saṣṭikara ābhā śārdduḷa baḷa jiṇi |–ṭa

lg.l: parama brahma nirañjana svāmī yāhāra nāmagoṭi
meru tulya jāṇi yāhāra śire saptapheṇī
sapata brahmāṇḍaku nātha tuhi se dhāreṇi | 334 |
kāhuṁ utapatti nātha kisa tohora nāma
kāhuṁ upujilu nātha kehi na jāṇanti tote | 336 |
aṇākāra puruṣa svāmī ākāra tora nāhiṁ
śūnyaku tusti kisa bho deba karibaiṁ muhiṁ | 337 |
kiñchita bākye yāhāra nāma brahmāṇḍeṇa ghoṭi | 338 |
ẏe cauśikhā svāmī tohora nija kāẏā | 339 |
svāmī koṭi koṭi siṁghara yāhāra parātrama
svāmī kunda karpūra jāṇi śveta dhabaḷa barṇṇa
taba padma caraṇe śate sahasra daṇḍa pariṇāmi
mama aprādha pāteka khaṇḍana kribā hāde svāmī | 342 |
rebatī ballabha nātha udita yāra nāma
taba padmapāde mora śata sahasra daṇḍa pariṇāma | 343 |

div.note: cañchaḷa citta nātha karuṇā jagajjeṭhī |–da, ḍha, ḍa
saunidhi baikuṇṭhe udita yāhāra nāma |–ṭa, da, jha, pa, ñja, ḍha, ḍa

lg.l: dhabaḷa rucira svāmī jaẏa tu kāmapāḷa | 345 |
svāmī biṣṇura jyeṣṭhapada udita yāra nāma
śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsa māgai tote dharma arthnamokṣa kāma | 346 | | 7664 |

div.note: nikhiḷa nirālamba nicaḷa paramabrahma yogī |–ta, jha, ṭha
yāhāra draśane nāśakara daṇḍa parityāgī|–ka, gha

biṣṇunātha tu ye īśvara rebatīra pati
badaẏanti śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsa taba caraṇe bhagati |–ta

div.head:
{@indrādi debaṅka sahita rāmakr̥ṣṇaṅkara
yuddha o sacaḷāra bibāha@}

lg.l: īśvaraṁku puṇa puṇa pucchā karai bāseba debatā | 2 |
svāmī baḍāi sambhabonge thāṭheka gheniṇa kr̥ṣṇa baḷarāma
ākāśa gaṅgākūḷa ghoṭiṇa saini dhāmanti abiśrāma | 3 |
mandara pabongtaku āsa samadaṇḍa sanya sajakari | 4 |
yebaṇa āẏudha gheni jambho daita badha | 6 |
se bajra śakati indra dhariacchi nija kare | 7 |

div.note: ādrābaḷī dhanuśasa ye kare sādhya |–ṇa, cha, kha, na

cauṣaṭhī koṭi putra indra debatāra saṅge
pārijāta māḷā ābharaṇa sabuṁkari aṅge |–tha, ja, jha, ṅa, gha, ca

lg.l: lakṣeka baḷa dhanu śrīkare chanti gheni | 11 |
deba dundubhi bādya ye brahmāṇḍa uchuḷa | 12 |
kareṇa śūḷa śahasra dhariṇa pañchu manu | 15 |
bāma dakṣiṇe śobhābana akṣaẏe troṇa beni
pāśupata nārāca deba śrīkare chanti gheni | 16 |
ye se kāmadebakaiṁ dahilā abhaẏe paramayogī | 18 |
dhabaḷa śaṅkha śvetabarṇṇa yāhāra mauḷi kuṇḍaḷī
bhabaku bhāba nātha abhābaku kopa ye aguḷi | 21 |
śaibagaṇanta gheni sadānanda calanti ati bege | 22 |

div.note: śatr̥jita nārāja śrīkare chanti gheni |–ṇa, kha, na, cha
kaiccthābanta nātha abhaẏe paramayogī |–ka, ta, gha, jha, ña
abhyāgata bacane brahmāra muṇḍamoḍi |–ja, ka, ta

lg.l: rudra indra duheṁ yāiṁ hoile parabeśa
kubera bijekale aneka sanya gheni pāśa | 28 |
kr̥tāntaka baḷa ye gheniṇa deba nāśakara
se yāiṁ prabeśa hoile mandara pabongtara | 29 |
ẏe chāriheṁ sainya gheni prabeśa āsi bege | 31 |
kāmyaka megha kāḷi megha cañchaḷābrateka megha
jambupaṭaḷa megha jaḷadhāra megha dhūmānteka megha | 32 |
piṅgaḷa megha candra kānti megha śārdduḷa ye megha

div.note: śire sīmanthanī ye mauḷi sītāṁśu |–ṇa, cha, kha, ta, ṭha, na

lg.l: ākāśa madhya gheni pātāḷa bhmabana kṣepī | 37 |
ẏehāṁkara mūḷe āṭhalakṣa pabongnta gheniṇa hemabanta
se yāiṁ prabeśa hele merura sameta | 41 |

div.note:
“sambhabong āṭha gheni calai ākhaṇḍaḷa |”
pare keteka pothira bhinna pāṭha :–

jhaṅkaḍa “ṇa” pothire aneka meghaṅkara nāma miḷe se sabu
abantara hetu pāṭhare diāgalā nāhiṁ |
meghamānaṅkara nāma ghaḍa ghaḍa megha, caḍacaḍa megha
meghamānaṅkara nāma dhūḷiā megha jhimijhimi ṭapaṭapa megha |
meghamānaṅkara nāma athoriā megha tarāṭaka megha
meghamānaṅkara nāma haṭahaṭā megha śasyajāta śasyaghāta megha | itya

lg.l: samatula dhāraṇa tāraṇa māraṇa pabana kāmyaka | 45 |
ghora garjana biṣṇu bāta akhiḷa śoṣaka
ẏemanta pabana debatā ye aṇachāṇa mr̥tti
śutra śanicara rāhu ketu śaśāṁka tule yānti | 49 |
naba sāgara hāhā huhu bhaṇḍāra adhikārī
naḷa kubaranta gheni kubera debatā bijekari | 51 |

div.note:
prāṇa, apāna, byāna, udāna , samāna, nāga, kūrma, kr̥kala
debādatta, dhanañjaẏe, ghoṣa, bhasma uṣma, trāsa, thaẏa, moha
aniḷa, samīra, sāmanta prabhr̥ti pabanamānaṅkara nāma pustakamānaṅkare bhinna prakārara acchi –
kapiḷa piṅgaḷa dhumra jaṭhara śikhi ye pañchu agni | keteka pothira pāṭha :–

lg.l: ye yāhāra saini gheni āsanti debaloke
tiriśi sahasra yojana yebeṇa mandara pabongta āẏatana
aneka mauṣadhi dārākṣa phaḷa acchi giribara pr̥ṣṭhe
se pabongta upare yāi bijaẏe rāmakr̥ṣṇe | 63 |
pūbonge gandhama dana pacchime mandara pabongta
uccabāca hoi ye rahile beni sainabaḷa
madhye nācai muni kaḷaha daṇḍaku bulāi | 66 |
tumbhe yāiṁ bāratā kuha deba indra | 67 |

div.note: madhyare chaḍā acchi yojana pāñchaśata |–ḍa, ḍha, gha

lg.l: manapabana daṇḍe basi bije mandaragiri parabate | 69 |
śrī jagannāthaṁka duhitā tu āṇiachu hari
amara nāẏikāẏe tāhāku nuhanti rūpe sari | 71 |
āho jujheṣṭhi debe boile mote hakāri
dvanda nohu samarpa ye sacaḷā kumārī | 74 |
tuhita loḍināhuṁ tote prāpata helā adabhmate
parigraha padārtha ẏe paraku bāhuḍāi debu se kemante | 75 |
bābu bigraha kathā ẏebe bichāraku kemanta
brahmā īśvare bije kariachanti br̥ndāarka baḷa gheni
rāmakr̥ṣṇa arjuna se sabonge jaṇa tini | 77 |
kehu tote samāna achai hāde raṇe
tu kimpāi kanyā debu āmbhe ailu akāraṇe | 78 |
citrasena boilā muṁ na kali haraṇa
āsuṁ āsuṁ birahitā kanyā mote kalāka baraṇa | 79 |
muni he icchāẏe bara baranti ṭiki rājāra kumārī
āho nārade tumbhe rāmakr̥ṣṇe kuha bege yāiṁ
smaste nāśa yobeṭi sacaḷā kanyāra pāiṁ | 83 |
dvandakale muni he hoibe ki āmbhanta sari
dhātā īśvare digapāle yāhākaiṁ achanti ābori | 85 |
āho dharme apāra maṇāiṁ muṁ kahili tāhāṁku
śāhāsra kathā rucai ki ṭaskara sabhāku | 88 |
tohora kathā śuṇi se aneka kalā kopa

lg.note: dardura bibāde ki ṭekai kāḷasarpa |–ka, ṭa, cha, gha
yaṣṭira bighāte yehne garjai kāḷasarpa |–kha, ta, ja, ḍha
kāḷasarpa = kāḷiẏa sarpā

nāradaṁka bacane kopile dharmasuta
ākāśaku nice nāśakalā citraratha |–ñja

lg.l: bahuta kopakalā se kanyā pheri magibāre
boilā rāmakr̥ṣṇa arjunakaiṁ muṁ māribai samare | 93 |
samarthaka haḷa mūṣaḷa bulāile deba toḷi | 94 |
jujheṣṭhi debe boile kopa na kara baḷarāma
daṇḍa sāma bhedamate abaśya kari kāma | 95 |
sanddha samādhāna nohile tebe se dvandvakari
muhiṁ yibi ki deba mandara pabongtaku
mohora bole yebe na diai kumārī
ẏekā nimiṣeke dvandva karita āmbhe pāri | 98 |
baijaẏantī māḷā goṭiẏe dharichanti deba hāthe | 99 |
sahadeba boile ṭhākure se yāāntu ẏeke
yebe kāḷe ẏe kathā nohiba sambodha
bāāna bāāna bhāra gada bhīmasenara benikare
āre āre pāṇḍabāẏe ẏete tumbhe manda | 108 |
tumbhaṁka lāgi se ye hoilā hīnajāti | 111 |
goḷakuṇḍā jārajātakā tumbhe aṭa re pāṇḍaba | 112 |
baḍhilā kanyā ghare kimpe re thua akāraṇa | 113 |
mohora citrasena na āṇilā tāku baḷe hari
birahītā kanyā se icchāẏe helā bari | 114 |
jujheṣṭhi deba boile kopa chāḍa debarāẏe

lg.note: durbhāsyāṁka mantre tumbhe jāta hela baḍajaṇe |–ña
durbhāsyāra mantre āmbhe harilu baḍajaṇe |–cha, ṇa, ka
kalpa abatāre se ye gauḍa svabhāba |–ṇa, cha, na
lg.l: thokāẏeka putra ye bongśa karanti surakṣā
para stirī haraṇe aneka dharma nāśi
tārā abhaḷāṣe tanu kṣīṇa hoilāka śaśī | 116 |
putraku na tiārila kala ye ẏesaneka kr̥tye
baḷaramaṁka kope amara rakṣā hoiba kemante | 119 |
ẏebeheṁ bola putra mora āṇilā agyāne
sanddha kathāre ta na paśilu pākaśāsane | 120 |
sacaḷākaiṁ ẏebe gheni yibā chāla jambhobhedī
śrī jagannāthaṁkara tule ho kimpāiṁ hou dvāndī | 121 |
kāmapāḷa ye, se kādambarī pāne bhoḷa
śaraṇa rakṣaṇa se ye bhagata bacchaḷa | 122 |
muhiṁ tote rāma chāmure karibi samarpaṇa
kopa chāḍi daẏā tote karibe saṁtriṣeṇa | 123 |
yāhara bole tu ẏete dvanda kalu rāẏe
rakṣā na yibu kāḷe tāhara pāẏe | 124 |
arjunara praẏe putra tote chāḍilā ẏetebeḷe

lg.note:
ābara biśeṣe tora karmara bipada
putra tote chāḍilā paḍiba paramāda |–ka, ta
putra sahodra tote chāḍilā paramāda paḍiba |–da, ḍha, tha
lg.l: parara bacane tora sampada na kara nāśa
nirutānta beḷaku samare na thiba biśvabāsa | 127 |
ẏeḍe baḍa sampada tu nāśa na kara akāraṇe | 128 |
yama kubera baruṇa āmbhanta samare nohanti raha | 129 |
parama pantita nātha kimpe hou baṇā
kehuṇasi kāḷare tumbhe rāmakr̥ṣṇaṁku sari noha | 131 |
svarguṁ amr̥ta hari nelā beḷe bainetra | 132 |
se beḷara kathā ẏebe galā ki pāsora | 134 |
boilā jujheṣṭhiṁki nāśa kara re citrasena | 136 |

lg.note: khaḷara bacane tora sampada na kara nāśa |–ṇa, cha, ka, ca

‘se ye rāmakr̥ṣṇa trailokya dhāraṇa’ pāṭhapare ‘ña’
pothire adhikā pāṭha –
indra boile tu ẏebe śuṇa ho jujheṣṭhi
rāmakr̥ṣṇa arjuna ẏe sabonge atānti tinigoṭi |
kiñchita mātre mu tāhānta pāre jiṇi
dvārikāre citrasena baribi nr̥pamaṇi |

lg.l: mudugara paḍante bhīma jujheṣṭhiṁki pacha kalā
bāhānāda dei kope garajiṇa bīra bhīma
jujheṣṭhiṁki boile bhīma tumbhe paḷāa begahoi
ẏetebeḷe thāanta tumbhe mandara pabongtare paḍi | 143 |
ẏehā śuṇi jujheṣṭhi ye hoile antara
re re kāra kari ye bolai pabana kumara | 144 |
bhīmasena bighāte se ratha hoilā masīguṇḍa | 146 |
aneka ratna maṇḍaṇi ratha yahuṁ gala bhāji
kopeṇa ugāḷile bee bhīmasean bege āsu | 148 |
bāsabara putra ye bidyādhara lakṣa chāri
pahuḍanti gadā mudugara chela catra kāti
konta mūṣaḷī sābeḷī ye bāruṇāśara yoci | 150 |
lg.note:
prahāranti kunta ye mudugara mūṣaḷī
bhīmasena aṅge paḍi samasta hoi dhūḷi | (keteka pothi)

lg.l: jujheṣṭhi debe ye tahuṁ aile paḷāi
jujheṣṭhidebe boile ubura ailu ho dharme
muhiṁ aili deba bhāiki mora dei | 155 |
ratha sahite deba na kale ārohaṇa
tahuṁ bahuta yādaba sanya dhāmanti mahābaḷī | 158 |

lg.note:
“sātabongśa gheni caḷanti jagannāthe” pare keteka
pothire bhinna pāṭha :–
arjuna bijekale nandighoṣa rathe
gāṇḍiba dhanu kare dharichanti bīra pāthe |
debadatta śaṅkha kaleka bādya

div.note: bhīmasena grabaṇe śubhilā śaṅkhadhuni
puṇi garji uṭhilā gadābara gheni |

lg.l: śuṇi parabatuṁ uṭhilā tahuṁ bhīma śira jhuṇi | 162 |
mandara pabongtuṁ bhīma paḍilāka bege ḍeiṁ
bidyādhara jaṇa mātrake kehi chāmure nāhiṁnā rahantā | 169 |

div.note: mahābāte yesaneke cūtaphaḷa loṭanti |–ṭa, ṭha, ka
mahābāte rambhātaru yesane paḍanti |–kha, ṇa, na
tule sodara tāra chāri ahibrata |–ja, ḍha, ga, gha, ḍa, ña, ṭha, ta

lg.l: aneka ratna bhuṣaṇa achai tāra kāẏe
re re kāra kariṇa se dhāiṁlā citraratha
tīkṣamunā śasra kare dhariacchi naśaniśi konta | 172 |
bhīmasena uparaku se māilā tāhā dhari
sehi konta cūragalā bhīmasena bāmaaṅge paḍi | 173 |
puṇa prahāra kalā bidyādhara bajra ye tumbure
koṭiẏe kiraṇa śakti kare gheniṇa ākhaṇḍaḷa | 180 |
ẏekāẏe samara karai ye pabana batsa
paḷābanta gandhabonge ye śrīkāḷa yūtha jāṇi | 185 |
bhāji pāḷābanti gandhabonge bhīmasena karai raṇakeḷi | 186 |
śuṇiṇa duguṇa teja bikāśai mārutira aṅga | 187 |
daśabiṁśa paciśa dhari diai ye phiṅgi
aneka yojane paḍile hātha goḍa bhāṁji | 190 |
śaraṇa boile bhīma duguṇa karai prahāra | 191 |

div.note: yesaneke keśarī dhāmaiṁ hāthīpala dekhi |–ṭa
yesaneke mattagaja dhāmaiṁ aśva dekhi |–ṇa, cha
yesaneke mattagaja dhāmaiṁ jatnu dekhi |–ḍha, ja, ta
bhāñjile kehi tāra chāmure na miḷi |–na, kha, cha, ka, ṇa

gandhabongṁka abhābe bīra brikodara
śaraṇa boile bhīma duguṇa karai prahāra |–ṭa, ḍa, da, na

lg.l: āre āre bhīmā boli ye kope dūruṁ ḍākadei
kare bajra dhariṇa se rāge jamakāi
ākāśa mārgare yahuṁ phiṅgidilā airābrata gaja

div.note:
kaṭāḷa dekhiṇa se deba maghabāna
āpaṇe bijekale pāka ye śāsana |–ṭa, ta, tha, ḍa, da, ja, jha
sannidhyeṇa miḷile ye purandara yāiṁ |–ṇa, cha, kha, na

mahānāga airāgrata dhailā kumbhasthaḷe
thorahaste guḍiāila kati ye mekhaḷe | (keteka pothi)

bhīmaku dhariṇa bulāilā ākāśamārge
phiṅgi diante bhīma paḍilā gandhamārddana pabongta lāge |–ka, tha, ja, gha

lg.l: hā hā sodara re mahā achārgaḷa yodhī
sañchapi kahile se ye samara bārat | 203 |
aneka gandhabonge ye se māilā samare
dekha ho pratāpa bhīmasenara ye kathā
indraku dekhiṇa bhīma na ghuñchilā yahuṁ
samare se debaindra ke pilāka tahuṁ | 206 |
kopeṇa ye airābrata nāga tāku phiṅgi pakāilā
rāgeṇa uṭhile se ye puruṣaṁka uttama | 208 |
rāma kr̥ṣṇaṁkara mr̥tti se dekhiṇa maghabāna
mahānāga bāhane bijaẏe deba pāka ye śāsana | 209 |
chaḍa marbhmata putra achanti tāra tule

div.note:
śuṇa ho yujehṣṭhi bhīmasenara kathā
bāsabara chāmuku se hoilā sāmarathā |–ka, ta, ja, ṭa
bāsabara tule rahite nohilā sāmarathā |–cha, ṇa, na, kha

lg.l: āho caitana caudige ghoṭigale jaḷadhara meghe
meghaṁkara garjane kampai bahmāṇḍa khaṇḍa sāta
svāmī baḍai durāpada paḍilā rakha he bhagabāne | 216 |
binatā nandana mukhaku ye chāhiṁle catradhara | 217 |
bābu meghe ta uṭhile bāsaba bacane
binatā nandana ye uhāḍilā beni pakhi
ākāśa ghoṭilā se samasta sanyamāna byāpi | 219 |
daśayuṇa māḍi rahichai yebaṇa yādaba baḷa
baraṣanti meghe ye mūṣaḷa dhārā jāṇi
garuḍa piṭhire paḍi taḷe paḍuacchi pāṇi | 221 |
meghaṁkara tule tu yāi bahasi bahana | 223 |
aṇachāśa pabana gheni tu bahibu sambhare

div.note: garuḍa piṭhire upuḍi paḍai pāṇi |–gha, tha, ṭa

lg.l: yujehṣṭha deba śrīkr̥ṣṇe boile pabana megha tule
khinikhināẏe thāiṁ jāṇilā se añjanāra suta | 227 |
lāṅguḷa upare tāṁku basāi āsai pābani | 228 |
ẏesanaka bitrama gati dhari hanumanta kṣepi
koḍiẏe yojana āẏatane gaḍe kalāka pābini | 236 |
bhābe lāñja āuji saini rahile niścinte
aṇachāśa pabna gheni ye bahilā pabana mahābaḷa
garuda pacchire paḍi mandāẏe bana phuṭi | 240 |
āho caitana, garuḍa pakhi chāẏeṇī, hanumanta lāñja pācerī prāẏe maṇi
ẏete pabana meghaṁkara ghāta yadubīre kicchihiṁ na jāṇi | 241 |
saini bikaḷa huanti na puṇa garuḍa pakhi poḍai
abicchanne bāṇa binddhalā manabhedī śara gheni | 244 |
tahiṁra upare arjuna kalā śara pīḍā | 245 |
pañchatāḷa bahaḷa hoi lpḍoẏe yojana bistīrṇṇa
śara chāuṇī kari ghoḍāilā bīra arajuna | 246 |
pabana bahai megha baraṣai mūṣaḷa dhāre
samaste ohāḍa hoile meru ye mekhaḷe | 248 |

div.note: sukheṇa saini ye rahile nicinte |–ṇa, kha, na, cha, ca
jhaḍiṇa mahābr̥ṣṭi puṇa upare paḍai |–ka, tha, ja

lg.l: bana ḍiṅgara pabongta ẏekameḷa hoilā jaḷaghoṭi | 252 |
hanumanta lāṁja paḍante sanyaku kicchi nāhiṁ bhaẏe | 253 |
bhaẏe pāiṇa se ye rahilā mahābāta

div.note: garuḍa pakṣa ye samāna tahuṁ kalā |–da, ḍa, ja,ñja, ḍha
garuḍa pakṣa tahuṁ ye saṁharana kalā |–ka, ḍa

lg.l: īśvara indra dui debatā chanti rahi | 261 |
naba sahasra yojna potā yebaṇa mandara parabata
bajra haḷa gheni pabongta rāma tāḍi
āho caitana koṭiẏe siṁghara baḷa yāhāra pratakṣe
mandara giri pabongta haḷamune rāma dhaile antarīcche | 267 |
niśācara baḷamānanta gheniṇa ye yama debatā
kālaphāśa kare mahiṣi bāhana gheni nāthā | 273 |

div.note: nirākuḷa puruṣa paramānanda yogī |–ḍa, ja, ta, da

lg.l: kopeṇa kr̥tāntaka baḷa gheniṇa dhamaiṁ atibege
paḷābanti saini kehi na rahile āge | 274 |
yama bhīma duheṁ yahuṁ hoileka ẏekabheṭa
nandighoṣa ratha ārohi yāiṁ ogāḷile phālaguni | 277 |
arjunara hāthe śahasra baiśya nara dekhi
agni boile bābu mohora kaṣṭathilā ludubudu byādhi
bābu kalāra upakāra na sumaranti yebaṇa loka
kāhuṁ śuhibi muṁ tora guṇa hr̥de pāñchi | 281 |
agnidebatā ye arjunaku bahuta purasari boli
bābu samare muhiṁ ẏebe tora katire hoili | 282 |
trailokyeṇa thile tāhā muṁ āsibaiṁ dahi | 283 |
śuṇa ho arjunaku prasanna hoile ye agni
camakāi nandighoṣa ratha bāhai pāṭha dhanurdhara | 285 |

div.note: kupuruṣa saṅge tāhāku karibāra lekha |–ṇa, kha, na

arjuna tule rahile pañchabongśa agni
kaṁpāi nandighoṣa bāhle phālaguni |–da, ḍa, ḍha, gha, tha

lg.l: daṇḍa gheni dhāiṁle kāḷa ey bilāḷa | 286 |
gadā gheni brikodara kāḷa bikāḷakaiṁ ātreṣi | 287 |
kāḷa bikālaku gadā gheni bhīmasena ātreṣi | 289 |
mūrddhunā senā paḍi bhāñjile yahuṁ raṇe
maiṁṣi bāhane ye andhāra ghora mr̥tti
śataśr̥ṅga sumari bhīma bistāra kalā kāẏā
re re kāra kariṇa bhīma bulāi gadābara
dhāiṁṇa piṭilā se yamara maiṁṣi upara | 295 |
pabanara bīryye jāta se kṣatriẏa paracaṇḍa
se maiṁṣi ki dhari yama upareṇa nei piṭi | 297 |

div.note:
bāhāna abhābe yama paḍai mahīloṭi
se maiṁṣira duiyāda bulai yama upare piṭi |–ka, ja

acetana hoi maiṁṣi paḍilā mahīloṭi
sehi maiṁṣira beni śr̥ṅga bulāi yama upare piṭi |–ta, ñja

lg.l: puṇa sacega hoi kare gadā gheni
gadā piṭante se ye dhailā māruti
sādha sādhu bhīma boli nārade kale dhuni
koṭiẏe sahasra baḷa pināka dhanu dhari hāthe | 307 |
cauda koṭi śibagaṇa achanti tāṁka tule
śrīkāḷa bāhane ye jaẏantaka bege miḷi | 310 |
ṭiṇāẏeka biṇāẏaka beni bhāluka upare gamai | 311 |
sañchaẏe sampada āja buḍāila re gauḍa | 315 |
āre sacaḷā kanyā tora kuḷa ye nāśinī
dvārikā bhmabana ku se kāḷānaḷa bahani | 316 |
tu kiṁpe majhire paśi maruchu akāraṇa | 318 |
tu kiṁpe madhye paḍi dhvaṁsi maru anamite
karmeṇa yogī tu kāleṇa abichāra mandabuddha

div.note: caṇḍa pracaṇḍa beni barāha ārohī |–kha, na, ta, ṇa, cha
bhīmeka pādagati dhāmai mahākāẏā |–ta, ka, gha, tha, cha, ñja
tora dohitā harilā basabara bāḷe |–ṇa, ka

lg.l: agna bāṇa kare dhari binddhale sadaśiba
re re kāra kariṇa ye dhāmai pābeni
ḍiṅgara bulāi se prahāra kalā hanu
puṇa puṇa prahāra ye karai māruti
bābu mohora piara ẏe ye tohora aṭe ajā
raha raha bābure samara kara paritejyā | 337 |
āu pabongtamānanta lāṅguḍe bānddha phiṅgilā sabunti | 338 |
śahasa chāḍiṇa se paḍai bhūmi mr̥cchi | 349 |
ulukāpāta praẏe diśila svarga marttya pātāḷa | 352 |
beni śahasra paritāḷa hoilā samara bhūmi
īśvare prahāra kale śūḷa ye śakati
dhanu chāḍi rudradeba paḍile bege ḍeiṁ
pāde pāda chandi muthe mutha marāmari
ugrasena mūḷe aneka sanya kaleka apahāra | 359 |
mukharāba śabada kari ogāḷile deba haḷī | 362 |
bajra mūṣaḷa ye saunanda yāra nāma
purandara chāmure prabeśa kare gāṇḍiba dhanu gheni | 368 |
nandighoṣa ratha ārohī bijaẏe pātha āga | 369 |
indadeba boile āre re mūrkha pāṇḍabā
debādhi debaṁkara muhiṁ se śiromaṇi debā | 370 |
chāra gauḍa bāuḍa pāiṁ chāḍilu mote sneha | 371 |
agyāna pāṇḍabā re gyāna tora nāhiṁ
pitāmātāṁku na cihnai re yebaṇa putra
gauḍaṁka meḷe baḍhilu kicchihiṁ na jāṇi | 375 |
kahuṁ kahuṁ koha ye baḍhilā asakanda

div.note: tāhāra jībana re aṭai biartha |–cha, da
yadyapi kṣatrībīra huanti se putra |–ka, cha, kha, gha, ṭa, da, ḍha

lg.l: kāhiṁ tora pabana kāhiṁ tora baiśyānare
āgahuṁ pitāmaha kimpe na kalu buddhi
kṣaṇake ẏe tohora jībana achai nā hr̥dagate | 382 |
nija kare arjuna dharilā gāṇḍima dhanu

div.note: akārane patagyāṁ karu tohora duṣukr̥ta |–ṇa, kha, na, jha
arjuna boilā deba na kaluta sanddha |–cha, ṇa, ka, na, kha
kṣaṇake nāśa hoibaṭi ẏe tohora gātre |–kha, ṇa, na
anibongāraṇa śara binddhale surasāiṁ |–ka, ta

lg.l: chāri aśvanta chāri śahasra binddhale debarāja | 387 |
bābala śareka ye peṣilā bāsebara tanu
arjuna upare nārāja binddhalā koṭi sāta | 390 |
adhācandra bāṇa ye arjuna bege sanddha
airābrata śarīre paḍi rome rome kaṇṭi | 392 |

div.note:
“chedi pakāilā indra debatāra dhanu”
pare ‘ta’ pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
puṇa jīmuteka dhanu dhailā suranātha
se shanu dharante puṇa teja bikāśe purasata |
jhaṁkāra śabada indra kalā yetebeḷe
mahā mahā rathīṁkara dhanu khasilāka baḷe |
se dhanu dhari kare āpaṇe śacīnātha
arjuna uparaku nārāja kale koṭisāta |
airābrata śarīre paḍi rome rome phuṭi |–kha, cha, ṇa
sehi sādr̥śa ye diśai airābrata |–ka, kha

lg.l: koṭiẏe kiraṇa se bajra śakatira teja
arjuna prahāra kalā brahma ye śakati | 398 |
bajra śakati brahma śakati duheṁ hoile bheṭa bheṭi
dibi bhmabana dahana heucchi trāsile parameṣṭhi | 399 |
duhiṁkara hābuḍā hbuḍire na sahai medinī
boilā pātāḷaṅāmī heuacchi sahi nuārai bhārā | 401 |
kāti chāḍile yehne sarpa huai niceta
yebaṇa śara pratigraha kari deichanti bahati
yāhāku peśai abaśya samare kehi nabarttanti | 405 |
aniryāpa śara se na yāi kaḷanā
romeke śate nārāja paḍilā bāsaba aṅge sinā | 406 |

div.note: tribhmabana dahijya hoai trāsile suraśreṣṭhi |–cha, ja, ṇa

kāti chāṭhile yehne sarpa huai biceṣṭita
bajra chāḍante indra hoile temanta |–da, ḍha, ja

lg.l: śarīra karddana hoilā rakata ye br̥ṣṭi
draśana kalāka pātha kāmapāḷa yahiṁ acchi | 409 |
āho samara teji indra kaiṁ chāhānte debahaḷī
yebaṇa śakati ghāẏe cūra hoẏe meru
manuṣya śarīra mātrake tāhā kehu meṇṭipāru | 413 |
sārathi hoile deba āsi arjunara rathe | 416 |

div.note: rudhire kardana śarīru hoẏe br̥ṣṭi |–ṇa, cha

lg.l: paśupatra nārāja deba dharichanti nija hāthe
yeuṇa śare tripura nāśakale deba biśvanāthe | 420 |
śata koṭiki puṇa yebaṇa nārājara jyoti
sumarante prāpata hoilā āsi arjuna hāthara | 422 |
arjuna sumarante tāhā āsi prāpata hoilā | 423 |
se śara goṭika candra śekhara tahiṁ nāhiṁ | 424 |
śuṇa ho manurājā yuddhara hāde kathā
baḷabīryya niūna dekhi brahmāṇḍe gale dhātā
bhaẏeṇa bārānidhi gheni paḷāile ratnākara kubera debatā | 426 |
pabana debatā ye samare gale hāri

div.note: akṣaẏe troṇa ye rudradebatā tahiṁ thilā |–tha, da, ṭa, ḍha, jha, ta, ḍa, pa, ka
himaśara nārāja candra debatā tahiṁ nāhiṁ |–ta, da, ja, ka, ḍa, gha, jha
bhaẏeṇa paḷāile kubera debatā |–kha, ṇa, na, cha, ca
baruṇa debatā ye samare gale hāri |–kha, ṇa, na, ca, cha

lg.l: baḷanāśa kari paḷāile yama ye debatā
yamara upare dutīyama bidhūra hoilā brikodara balabantā | 430 |
troṇa śahasra dhanu śrīkare yahu nāhiṁ
īśvara ubhā hoile kākhare hātha lāi | 432 |
gobinde boile īśvaraṁku nārāja bindha pātha
muhiṁ na mārai deba raṇe piṭhidele | 434 |
arjuna boile svāmī bijekara yā debarāja | 435 |

div.note: taratare paḷāile jantu nāśakara |–da, ḍha, ta, ja, ka

indraṁku ta rakṣākala amara svargapura
ẏemanta pratagyāṁre ta yādabanta jiṇile sunāsīra |–ḍa, ḍha, da

lg.l: svāmī muhiṁ ye pratagyāṁ kali indra kaiṁ nāśibi
amara sabhāra āstāne āna indra basāibi | 440 |
yujheṣṭhi debe boile nārāẏaṇaṁka yehne āgyāṁ
tāhākaiṁ mohora beḷe karipāribi ki abagyāṁ | 442 |
āho caitana yujheṣṭhi bhīma arajuna sahadeba
indra āstāne yujheṣṭhiṁki bije karāile debarāje | 445 |

div.note:
“indra āstāne yujheṣṭhiṁki bije karāile debarāje”
pare keteka pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
yujheṣṭhi boile bābu śuṇa damodara
anamite sampada nāśilā sunāsīra |
svāmī yebaṇa āgyāṁ dila ho bhābagrāhī
tohora thāpita āmbhe aṭu pāñchabhāi |
svargara sampada bhāñjili kiñchita ma tarai
āmbhara thāānte īśvara tote gabong bahi |
bābu svargara sampada kiñchita mātara
tohora sadaẏa thāu mote catradhara |

lg.l: sapata nidhi gheni āsi khaṭilā dhaneśvara | 449 |
hāhā huhu mūḷe ye tinikoṭi bidyādhara
yahne ye ārādhanā indraṁku karanti nityakarme
sārigāmā dhuni ye sapata svara bīṇā
chāmure gata āgata kahai mantrī sahadeba
yehenne amare pūbongra bidhāna hoilā sehibhāba | 457 |

div.note:
saraguṇā adhāṭi sapatasura beṇī
nr̥tyarase khaṭanti amara biḷāsuṇī |–ña

sārile maṅgaḷa dhuni sapata beṇī
nr̥tya parīkṣā nārade khaṭāile āṇi |–da, ta, tha

lg.l: priẏā śrīẏā tārā ye tanu citrotpaḷā
līḷā śrībaccha menakā bhānumatī ye kamaḷā | 464 |
maruā pāruā keśī pābongtī bimaḷā ye rādhā
māḷī mārutī sabongjiṇā nārāẏaṇī ye banitā
jānakī suramati bhānakī sītā ābara śāẏeṁtā | 467 |
ẏe cauṣaṭhi kanyāṁkara mūḷe bharaharaṣa nāẏekāṇī
cauṣaṭhi koṭi apakṣarāẏe ẏehāṁkara nāceṇī khaṭiṇi | 468 |
āho caitana śarahasundarī nāme ẏekai apakṣarī
śacīdebīṁka bimāna se ye bāhai bidyādharī | 472 |
śacī boile tuhi lo yāasi bahana
ẏehikṣaṇi mohora chāmuku hakāriṇa āṇalo arjuna | 473 |
śacī bije kariachanti pārijātaka kaḷapataru taḷe
śacī boile bābu arjunare ẏeṭi bāsudebaṁka dulaṇī
citrasena ẏehākaiṁ harilā kicchihiṁ na jāṇi | 477 |
ẏehāra pāiṁṭi se ye hoilā ẏeḍe dvanda
bābu ẏeṇe se nāśalā indrara sampada | 478 |
bābu tumbhe mohora putra ye basila amare
yebe tumbhe inda pade basila ākāśe
ẏebe indra debatāku āṇidia mohora pāśe | 482 |
chāla māẏe poẏe āstānara taḷe karibā daini | 483 |
śacīṁki dekhiṇa se dharma ye yujheṣṭhi
bho svāmī jagata mohana patiṁ dehi, patiṁ dehi | 490 |
yujheṣṭhi debe boile go bije karasi māẏe
māgo anugraha nāthara kopa śānti karāi
kaṣṭhore yujheṣṭhi deba boile baḷadeba ṭhākuraṁku | 494 |
śrī jagannātha uthile yujheṣṭhi debaṁka ubhā dekhi
tu deba nīḷāmbara saẏaḷa jana cintāmaṇi
tu deba paramabrahma haḷa mūṣaḷa pāṇi | 496 |
tu deba nīḷāmbara śrīkr̥ṣṇa jyeṣṭha dekṣe | 497 |

div.note:
tu deba saẏaḷajana cintā bratantā haḷīmukhe
tu deba abhaẏe nīḷāmbara kr̥ṣṇa saṅge |–ja, ta, gha, ḍa, tha, ṭha

lg.l: tu deba śaraṇa uddha raṇa mahārūpī
tu deba rohiṇī nandana kādembarī rasapāne matibhoḷā | 502 |
tu deba duṣakr̥ta harantā paralokara bandhu
badanti sāroḷā dāsa śrī kāmapāḷa kr̥pāsindhu | 505 |
pādya arghya gheniṇa sehu manu mahārājā
baḍāi caritra muni śuṇili taba mukhuṁ

div.note:
tu deba nirākāra debongkara debā
tu deba balarāma bhānucandra debā |–ḍa, ḍha

tu deba gagana śūnya dhāraṇā nāba
tu deba bhānurudra indra brahmadebā |–ja, ta, ṇa

tu deba dr̥dha āsane saunidhi
tu deba sapata kuṇḍaḷa bārānadhi |–ka, ja, ta, na, ṭa
mahābhāratha kathā śuṇanti baibasuta manu |–kha, ṇa

lg.l: agasti bolanti ho śuṇa manu mahābaḷī | 509 |
prasanna hoile svāmī deba ye anante | 510 |
kebaṇa kathā acchi kaha deba dharmarāẏe
yujheṣṭhi boile svāmī yebe hoilaṭi prasanna
svāmī tumbhara thāpilāra sinā aṭe debaindra
tumbhe he dila tumbhe hariba ki tāhāra sampada | 513 |
svāmī anugraha nātha yebe hoila prasanna
āgyāṁ dile bāsaba debatāṁku jīāiṁ āṇiba se arajuna | 514 |
āgyāṁ dile indraku tu gheniāsa yāiṁ | 515 |

div.note: tumbheheṁ dila tambhe rañchila bibāda |–ṇa, ñja

‘āgyāṁ dile indraku tu gheniāsa yāiṁ’ ehi pādānta pare
‘kha’ pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
śuṇa baibasuta manu badanti agasti
hāthī kāndhe moha yāithilā surapati
cetanā pāilā yahuṁ deba suranātha
mane mane lāja sehu pāilā bahuta |
bahuta lāja pāiṇa indra caḷigalā
nija mandire yāiṁ prabeśa hoilā |
kāhāku samāsyā na diai surapati
mahālajjā pāiṇa se basilā mathāpoti |
baḷarāmaṁ bacame bīra arajuna
prabeśa hoile yāi indra sannidhyāna |

lg.l: rāmakaṁra bacane se amr̥tākṣa śara gheni
moha tejiṇa se uṭhi basile sahasrākṣa | 517 |
citrasena tule yegeka thile raṇe paḍi
cetanā śareṇa se uṭhile moha chāḍi | 518 |
sādhu sādhare arjuna mora putra tu samare sabongsiddhā
arjuna boilā svāmī puṣyeka rathe kara bije
tuhi se amara svarge āsi pāilu deba pūjā | 526 |
ẏebe yāi madhyapure bhārā kara nāśa
ẏehi deha gheniṇa svargare āsi basa | 527 |
śrī baḷarāma caraṇe indra debatā pariṇāmi
aneka doṣa aparādha karibā mora kṣamā | 529 |
hr̥dagate bighaṁsu moho śrī baḷarāma nāmagoṭi | 530 |
śuṇa ho caitana bāsabara bacane baḷarāme hoileka śānti
īśvaraṁka bacane tuhi se paśilu anīti | 531 |
śuṇi baḷarāme bāsabaṁka śrīhaste dile śāḍhī
ẏebe thāa tumbhe amara svarge sukhe rājyakari | 533 |
āpaṇe yujheṣṭhi deba kale sabong samādhāne | 535 |
kathāẏe kahibi deba yogāi ki tumbha bichāraku | 536 |
śrī jagannāthe boile deba tumbhara bacana alaṁghi
svāmīra bacana ye sebaka kāhiṁ meṇṭi
pratagyāṁ sārthuka hoilāka pāile sabonge lajjā | 540 |
svāmī jagata mohana mohora bacana karibā
sacaḷā kanyākaiṁ ẏebe citrasenaku pradāna karidebā | 541 |
īśvara ye pratagyāṁ kale sacaḷāku pradāna karibā citrasene
tāhāṁkara pratagyāṁ rahu se na yāntu abhimāne | 542 |

div.note:
īśvaraṁka pratagyāṁ nohe deba āna
jagata puruṣa se na pāu abhimāna |–cha, kha, ṇa, ca

lg.l: tumbhe ye pratagyāṁ kala yujheṣṭhaṁki indra pade basāibi amare
tuṣṭi anumate dharme anukūḷa thāa gheni | 544 |
bainetraẏa bāhāne śrī puruṣottama kale bije
doṣa upekṣi puṇa kalu tu sadaẏe
yujheṣṭhiki ẏemanta acchi se ākāśe pāiba pūjā
ẏe tini jagate se hoiba mahārājā | 549 |
gobinde boile pitā bala rāmakaiṁ māgile yujheṣṭhi
bahana hoi yibā deba amara bhmabanaku
śuṇi pitāmaha praśaṁsā kale yujheṣṭhi debaṁku | 551 |

div.note: ẏekāṅga pr̥thīre se hoiba mahārājā |–ṇa, na, cha, kha

lg.l: āpaṇe āchāryya hoile ruṣi ye paulaste
mana hrānti chāḍile se deba maghabāne | 562 |
gobinde boile svāmī dvārikā chāla yibā
yujheṣṭhi debe boile āmbhe kalu ye niẏama
banabāsa na kale nāśa yibaṭi dharma | 566 |

div.note: sudharmā sabhāẏe bijaẏe sadāśibe |–ṭa, ṭha
kanyā koḷe gheni bije prabhma jagannāṭha |–ṭha, ñja
lājāhoma sāri pāraṇa kale ghr̥te |–(?), ṇa, ta, cha, kha

div.head:
{@kīrttibāsa detya badha, candra bhāgā tīrthara māhātmya
o arkadaitya badha@}

lg.l: mahātamāṁka caraṇe praṇapatya pañchu ye pāṇḍabe | 3 |
bolanti kausike bābu ẏehu aṭe mahātīrtha
ẏekāmbara tīrtha ẏe ye ẏekāmbara bana | 5 |
yujheṣṭha debaṁku boile bābu ẏe liṅgarājā
āge arghya dei ho arajuna ẏehānta karibā pūjā | 6 |
kauśike boile bābu ẏekāmbara īśvare dekha

div.note:
mārakaṇḍaṁka caraṇe praḷamba paṇḍusute
ubhā hāichanti ye pāṇḍaba pañchu bhrāthe |–ṇa, ca, cha, na

lg.l: bāuna koṭi liṅga ẏehi stānare achanti
samastaṁka upare śreṣṭha liṅga ye aṭanti | 9 |
śuṇa bābu manadei ẏekāmbara bana kathā | 10 |
bābu ādyahuṁ aṭai ẏe hāde ẏekāmbara bana
nabadīpa pr̥thīki ẏe bāstarī ye kīḷā
śaṅkhapadma mahāpadma trakoṭaka kuḷila mahāśveta takṣaka ananta
ẏe aṣṭakuḷā nāgare rajju dauḍi chanda sāta | 17 |
bābu trīti bāsna boli ẏehu asura beni
āre āre kalpe kalpe amara hoi rahithāa ẏetha | 19 |

div.note: ādyahuṁ ẏehi kṣetra ẏe siddha ye sambhutā |–ka, tī, tha, ja, ḍa

yujheṣṭhi pachārile tīrthara bāratā
kahanti kausike paṇḍita mahāgyāṁtā |–ka, da, ja, gha, ḍha, tha, ḍa

lg.l: bābu yujheṣṭhi kicchidina ante amara bhāṅgile se amara kale jara
subarṇṇakūṭa pabongta boli nāma dile beni
bābu saudāsa rājāra ẏe aṭanti beniputra
trīti bāsana boliṇa ẏe beni ye daita | 23 |
ruṣi bipra tapodhana ḍareṇa se thāna parityāgī | 24 |
śuṇa ho yujheṣṭhi satyayuga ẏemante bahigalā
jana manuṣya kehi ātayāta ẏe tīrthe nohilā | 25 |
dānaba bhaẏe paśi nuārile kehi debaloke | 27 |
tebe sinā mukata hoibe ẏehi mahātīrthe | 29 |
īśvare boile tumbhe śuṇa go pābongtī

div.note: pañchuki jananta se bāṭare khāānta jagi – kha, cha, ṇa, na |

lg.l: pābongtī boile baḍāi durānte daita ari
nārāẏaṇa cakraku ẏehāṁkara nāhiṁ kicchi bhaẏe | 32 |
abhaẏe hoi rahile se pāpiṣṭha danuja | 33 |
biśvanātha svāmī tumbhe samare nohila ye sari
biśvāsaghātaka kale tāhānta pāribā abā māri | 34 |
tumbhe yebe kopa na kariba deba mote
muhiṁ abhinna bhāriyā hoibi tāhāṁkara praẏamate | 35 |
śuṇiṇa aneka sānanda hoile deba tripurāri | 36 |
ẏe mahātīrtha go tumbhe uddhāra kara girijā | 37 |
īśvaranta upekṣiṇa se ye aile pābongtī | 38 |
āho caitana samsāra sāgara ẏe ye na yāi kaḷaṇā
pābongtīṁkara rūpa ye na yāi kahaṇā | 39 |

div.note: ẏe baḍāi durāpada daita ari |–ḍa, ḍha, ka
abhinna hoile se āmbhara ātmaja |–ḍa, ḍha, tha
abhaẏe hoile se āmbhara ātmaja |–ja, jha, gha
muhiṁ abhinna hoibi tāhānta bhāriyā hoibā pariyante |–ḍa, jha, ḍa, ta, tha, ja
pābongtīṁka pādagatiku kehi nuhanti sari |–ḍa, ḍha, kha, da

lg.l: pābongtīṁka rūpa se deba nuārile cihni | 42 |
bābu ẏe mahātīrtha uddhāra karibā nimante
citra utpaḷāuṁ se dakṣiṇa bāhinīẏe phuṭi | 44 |
āho yujheṣṭhi pitr̥lokamānanta ye abasāne dahana kari
se dahana śītaḷa hoai ẏe nadīre srāhāna kari | 45 |
ẏesaneka mahimā ẏe sāta śītaḷa nadī
pañchu baṭī banaru se āsuacchi bhedi | 46 |
pāṭa maṛhiāḷa ye debī ābharaṇa kale aṅge
kīrtti bāsana boli beni ye daite
dekhiṇa beni dānabe ye uṭhile taḍati
āmbhara bhaẏe ẏetheṁ jana manuṣya ātayāta
baḍai dulabha ẏe āmbha karmara sukr̥ta | 52 |
pābongtī boile bābhiẏe muhiṁ dadhibikā aṭai gauḍaṇī
ẏe banamārge paśili muhiṁ bāṭa ta na jāṇi | 54 |
dhāneṇa tohora kāryya dhānyeṇa acchi kāryya
aṣṭaratna madhye yāhā māgibu tā debuṁ āja | 56 |
tohora āmbhara hoiba āja go baḍāi pīrati
āmbhara tahiṁki go dahi āṇuthibu ṭiki niti | 57 |
āpaṇe gosāmaṇi paraśanti śaḍāi kare gheni | 59 |
deuṁṇa na sarai se māẏā dadhira nauti | 61 |
āho yujheṣṭhi kṣīrodra piibāku samartha yebaṇa benibīre
ẏekā dadhi nautika ye aṇṭilā sambhare | 62 |
nirjjana bana gahana kehi nāhiṁ kati
bolai gopāḷuṇi mote debā nā yisa hoi
baṇā hoi paḍili muṁ tumbhara hastai | 66 |

div.note: paraśanti pārabatī hāthare aṛhā ẏeka gheni |–ca, gha

lg.l: daitye boile āmbhanta baśakalu rūpaguṇa dekhāi
paḍilu ātmara mukhe yibu āra kāhiṁ | 67 |
poḍai kinā ẏe tumbha gopāḷuṇī janna
ẏe naba yaubana gheni deśe deśe bhrama | 68 |
ājahuṁ tora janma dāridryapaṇa kara tejyā
aneka kūtuhoḷe thibā āmbhara huasi bhāriyā | 69 |
āmbhara bacana tu go meṇṭibu yadyapi
asuraṁka mukharu debī nirāśa bacana śuṇi
rubai sundarī tahuṁ netr̥ bahi pāṇi | 71 |
mohora mr̥tu yebe tumbhara se hāthe | 72 |
karma boli sinā āpaṇe yāhā arji
ānaku na diśi āpaṇe tāhā bhmañji| 73 |
mama karme yebe achai ẏehenneka ghaṭaṇa
bhakṣa mora māẏeṁsa khāa tumbhe bhāji
tumbhara hāthe muhiṁ ẏe janma yāi sujhi | 75 |
asura boile āmbhanta tu go nirāśa kimpā kahu
tote yāhā bhakṣibu āmbhe joi kimpā na khāuṁ | 76 |
tu āmbhanta rakṣā ẏebe karasi go māẏe
danteṇa tiraṇa gheni beni paḍile tāra pāẏe | 77 |

div.note:
ājahuṁ tora ẏe br̥ttiki kara paritejyā
dukha na pāi āmbhara hua tu bhāriyā |–kha, na

asuṁraka bacana debī nirāśare śuṇile
rubai sundarī ati santāpe hoi baikulye |–da, ḍha

lg.l: buḍilu madana jaḷe go tohore śaraṇa
ratiraṅga dei go rakhasi pañcha prāṇa | 78 |
adabhmata kāraṇe tumbhe hoila baḍa dukhī | 79 |
tumbhara bikaḷe pache muṁ gr̥habāsa karibi tejyā
daẏā basilā muñ tumbhara hoibi bhāriyā | 80 |
mohora brateka acchi yebe kariba pratiṣṭhā
kaha go mahātmāṇī tumbhara kisa bata | 82 |
kiñchita mātra brata ye achai mohori | 83 |
tumbhe duheṁ mote ye kāndhare basāi
ẏeteke pratiṣṭhā ye hoiba mohora brata
śuṇi aneka haraṣa ye hoile benibhrātha | 85 |
kāme baśa hoiṇa se na cetanti kicchi
āho trīti bāsana kāhiṁ aṭanti paramayogī
yubatīṁka baśe paḍi se samasta parityāgī | 88 |
beni kandha pātile se beni bīramaṇi
bakṣasthaḷe beni caraṇa dei uṭhile gosāmaṇi | 89 |

div.note: surati dāna dei go rakhasi jībana |–ta, ṇa, cha, tha, gha
akāraṇe tumbhe hoasi baḍa dukhī |–ka, ṇa, ta, kha, ṭha, na, ca, ña |

lg.l: hasanti nācanti se kare karatāḷi dei | 90 |
phikāra śabada kariṇa debī dile chāpi
ẏe māẏeākūṭa āmbhanta maṇita na galā | 96 |
ātreṣi darāṇḍi dhari loḍanti beni hāthe | 97 |
huṁkāra nādakari debī asura bhmajanta upāḍi | 99 |
rodhira māẏṁsa kardana hoi tusti karanti dānabe
māgo buḍāilu śurīra stirī mātra bhābe | 100 |
ẏebe āmbhe ta nāśagalu na gāṇiṇa benibhāi
tuhi kiẏeṭi go āmbhaṁku na kahu kāhiṁpāiṁ | 101 |

div.note: huṁkāra śabada kariṇa debī uṭhile nāci |–ja, ḍa, ḍha, da
āhuri benibhmaja debī kaleka prakāśa |–da, ḍa, ḍha, tha, ña

lg.l: badaẏanti gosāmaṇi muhiṁ pābongtī aṭai hāde | 102 |
kaṇakalpa dr̥śya go hoithāu āmbha kāẏe | 103 |
aneka tīrtha ye ẏethi hoiba tahiṁ yātrā
kaṭhe ra dekhi tāhānta daẏā kale gosāmaṇi
māga re bara tumbhe boile ṭhākurāṇī | 105 |
asure boile mātā go yebe hoiachu dr̥śya
ẏetekeheṁ thāu āmbhanta prāṇe na kra nāśa | 106 |
māgo āmbhe kīrtti bāsana boli ye benibhrātha
kīrttibāsa boli nāma hoiba ẏehu tīrtha | 107 |
prasanna hoiṇa gosāmaṇi tāhānta kale daẏā
ẏe tīrtha heu kīrttibāsana boli bara dileka abhaẏā | 108 |
bābu ẏekāmbara deba pāśe ẏe beni pāṣāṇa
āho yujheṣṭhi kīrttibāsana yibā boli ye āsiba ẏe tīrthaku
se puṇya adhe prāpata hoaiṭi kīrttibāsanaku | 110 |
ẏe duhiṁkara madhye yehu yāānti na jāṇi
bindu sāgara kūḷe achanti debī śoi | 113 |
kebaṇa carita ẏe baḍai āśrija hoẏe | 114 |

div.note: asure nāśantiṭi ẏehāṁku hāde puṇi |–kha, ṇa, ta

lg.l: gosāmaṇiṁka padataḷe achai liṅga ye goṭiẏe
pābongtīṁku na dekhi īśvare kale kopa | 117 |
biṁjhagiri pabongte yāi bijaẏe kale jhāti | 118 |
se biṁjhagiri pabongta pātāḷaku paśilā rudra pādabhare | 119 |
bābu ẏeṇukari pātāḷagāmī hoilā biṁjhagiri parabata
bābu loḍante ẏethe āsi bheṭile deba śūḷapāṇi
hā hā sakhī boliṇa deba ye suḍhaḷe
īśvara svāmī ye bijekale pābongtīṁka pādataḷe | 122 |
śuṇa bābu yujheṣṭhi ẏe liṅgara ādikathā
śambhu hoi rahile se īśvara debatā | 123 |
ẏe mahātīrthe āsi tapa kalāṭi rābaṇa | 125 |
laṁkākaiṁ chāḍi rābaṇa ẏethaku ailā kisa arthe | 126 |
śuṇa ho yujheṣṭhi brahmāṁkara samaẏake hoilā chāriputra
svastha pāi rahile se baibasuta muniṁkara pure | 131 |
subarṇṇara śiṁga boli tāpitā kale rakṣa
boile tumbhe duheṁ ẏe śiṁge pureka nibongāṇa kara | 134 |
baḍa bicitra kari pureka nibongāṇa kariba
asura bhaẏe hoile ẏetheṁ tetiśakoṭi debatānta deba ṭhāba | 135 |
ẏehimati laṁkāgaḍa srijiba meḍha maṇḍapa jagatī | 137 |
dhātāra bacane rakṣa bhakṣa duheṁ lāgi
mahā kāmarūpī se gaḍhanti tāhā begi | 138 |
brahmāṁkara bacane sehu beni rakṣa bhakṣa

div.note: śuddhamanu bolikari ẏehāṁkara bāḷa |–jha, ka, ṭa, ya, ja
ghaṭaṇa bindhaṇīmāna dile bedabara |–ṭa, jha, gha
pācerī uñcha hoiba gaḍasañcha jāṇi |–ṇa, ja

lg.l: patāra āgyāṁ pāi sehu rakṣa bhakṣa
samaẏeke sehu datye upadraba kaleka ākāśa
anīti dekhiṇa nārāẏaṇa tāhāṁkaiṁ kale nāśa | 142 |
rakṣa bhakṣaṁkara putra ye heti paraheti
tāhāṁkara putra ye upujile baḷī mahābaḷī
baḷi mahābaḷīra putra māḷī ye sumāḷī
se laṁkāgaḍa śūnya ye hoilā samaẏe
kehi ātayāta nohanti tahiṁ padmalābhara bhaẏe | 152 |

div.note: susthare rājya bhoga karanti pāi sukha |–kha, ṇa, na, ṭha

lg.l: biśrabā ruṣi ye baibasuta manu ghare thile
gharaṇīṁka sahite laṁkāre thānti biśrabā maharuṣa
pātāḷa svargapuruṁ dine sumāḷī datya āsi | 154 |
bāẏebya nāme karaṇa āẏuṣmāna nāme yoga
se dina sumāḷī ye ailā madhyasvarge
pure pure datya ye bulile ātmante
kāhiṁra brāhmaṇa ture mohora pure paśu
brāhmaṇa hoi kiṁpe asura bhūmiki āsu | 160 |
biśrabā boile āmbhanta kopa na kara re bābu
tohora kopakale āmbhe kṣaṇeheṁ kimpe thibu | 161 |
tu yebe laṁkāgaḍara aṭu āho rāẏe
tote debuṁ āmbhe anna ye puḍaẏe | 162 |
ẏete boli biśrabā bhojana tāku diẏe
bhmañjaṇa triputi ye hoilā daita ari
nicaẏe brāhmaṇa tuku prāpata hoilā laṁkāpurī | 165 |
ḍareṇa naukeśī rāilā rābaṇa nāme baḷā
ẏeteh thile maribu bābu bahana hoi paḷā | 177 |
paḷāi paśilā āsi maudadhi uttara taṭe

lg.note: dekhiṇa sananda ye hoile muni tanu |–ṇa, ca, kha

lg.l: samasta nirodhila kāḷa kāma trodha nidrā
śarīru māṁsa kāṭi pakāi tahiṁ niti | 182 |
caurāśi koṭi amara bara māgilā yātudhāna
ẏeka śarīre hoiba mohora koḍiẏe ye bhmaja
bhoḷe ṇa prasanne ye hoile somaẏā
atuṭa aphuṭa hou rābaṇa tora kāẏā | 186 |
kiñchita bhagate se kale bahuta sadaẏā
bābu ẏe liṅgagoṭi hāde rābaṇa somaẏā | 187 |
ẏehāku sebākari ye yāhā karanti icchā
se somāẏā liṅgaku bahuta huanti binaẏe | 189 |
lg.note:
subarṇṇacūṭa pabongta dakṣiṇa kachāḍe
bāṇeka thāpi japai mahāmantra gāḍhe |–ta, ba
samasta nirodhilā basilā yogamudrā |–gha, ka, ta
bhoḷeṇa prasanna ye hoile deba hara |–kha, cha, ṇa, ta, na, ca
naraloke abadhya muṁ hoibi debarāja |–ja, gha
lg.l: bābu ẏe hāde aṭai amāpata saraiṁ
ẏethe srāhāna kale aneka pāpa ye harai | 190 |
ẏethe srāhāna kari puṣpeśvara liṅga dekha
ẏe se mahāliṅga hāde aṭanti kaplā | 192 |
bibhīṣaṇakuiṁ rājya samarpi sītāṁku gheni āsanti bāhuḍi | 193 |
rāmeśvara boli liṅgeka thāpile se bodhi | 194 |
sugrībara nr̥pati ẏe liṅgagoṭi kale pūjā
mahākṣetra dekhi se tetiśa koṭi debe

lg.note: rāmeśvara boli nāma ye prasiddhi |–tha, ṭha
jambeba pūjile kapileśvara mahāliṅga |–tha, ja, jha, ka, ṭha, na

lg.l: bāsuki bijekale ye ẏehu bhmabana bāse | 202 |
koṭiẏe tīrtha gheni ẏethe puṣkara bijekari | 203 |
kahibā muni he ẏehu arkatīrthara kathā | 206 |
tāhara putra sehu kalā keuṁṇa doṣa
keuṁṇa prakāre tāku birañchi nārāẏaṇa kale nāśa | 207 |
badanti mārakaṇḍe śuṇa ho paṇḍu suta
kr̥tāntaka daitatahuṁ jāta arka ye daita | 208 |
amara bibāde jambodatya indra kalā hata
hiraṇya hiraṇākṣa boli tāhāra beni śiśi | 211 |
se ye nirodhilā bhmabi bhmabana sabong | 212 |
arka daita boliṇa ye putreka tāhāra | 214 |
baḍa sucitte se pālai jana prajā | 217 |
rājyayāka bhagana hoilā daridrabasī hoilā samarāṣṭa | 219 |
bichārai nr̥pati muṁ karatākaiṁ karibi sebā
ẏekā āsane basilā pañchadaśa barṣara nrādhāra | 223 |
bichāri guṇai se arka nāme daita
na puṇa mora pada gheniba māgiṇa birañchi
aneka stuti kari se hoilā pariṇāmi
ākāśe thāi tāhā dekhile karatāra debasvāmī | 227 |
lakṣe yojane thāiṁ tāhā dekhile karatāra
nuhai nuhai boli baḍhāi dile kara | 230 |
adoṣe kimpe tu prahāra kara re asura | 231 |
arka daitara tule deba kaleka sāṁgrāma
candrabhāā tīre thile ye candragiri pabongta
tahiṁ nei kachāḍile deba arka ye daita | 237 |
se candracūḍa giri asura paḍi cūragalā
se arka daitara deha kicchihiṁ nohilā | 238 |
arkadatyara dehe paḍi catra hoilāka dhūḷi | 239 |
keuṇasi prakāre se nāśa nohilā kauṇopa
arka daitaku māḍi basile maudadhi pacchima kachāḍe | 242 |
pr̥thibīra agni koṇe bijaẏe jagata jyoti
teṇu se koṇāarka tīrtha jagate bikhyāti | 243 |
se kaṇaẏabindu rājāku arka prasanna hoile
sātaghaḍi pariyante tāhāra rājye kaṇaẏa baraṣile | 244 |
maudadhire srāna kari candrabhāgā tīrtha dāhi
yābata kāḷaku nātha tuhi se baradāẏe | 250 |
timiri bidāraṇe nātha tu prasanna anādi
praḷaẏa kāḷa bañchāntā tuhi se bhāsakara | 252
sajjana tāraṇa nātha tu yogeśvara svāmī
taba caraṇa paṁkaja nātha mama pariṇāmi | 253 |
lg.note: pr̥thīra bhārābhara uśvāsi śrīpati |–ṇa, ṭa, ṭha, kha

pr̥thibīra koṇe bijaẏe saṁgyāpati
teṇu koṇāẏeka tīrtha boli hoilā yugati |–jha

kauśikaṁka bacane bicitrabīryya nāti
dhyāne laẏakari tāṁku kale bahu sṇati |–ṭa, na

lg.l: ẏe agati saṁsāraku nātha tuhi se kāraṇa | 254 |
kāḷa bañchāilā nātha sāroḷa dāsa kabi | 255 |
yujheṣṭhi ārādhanā kale birañchi nārāẏeṇa debatā | 256 |
makara māsa madhye maudadhi candra bhāgā
bābu ẏe tīrthe srānakari ye buḍāiba mathā
makara māse candra bhāgā maudadhi madhyastāne
yebaṇa jana ẏethi ye karanti puṇḍadāne | 259 |
baṁśe agati ye na thāi pitr̥ gaṇaṁke | 260 |
anya śrāddha sari nohe dvādaśa pariyante
ẏetheṁ piṇḍa dile ye taranti samaste | 261 |
bābu ẏethe srāhāna kari ye pūjanti birañchi
gaḷuta kuṣṭha byādhi thile pakāi sabong pocchi | 262 |–| 490 |
lg.note:
ka, kha, gha, cha, ñja, ta, tha, pothimānaṅkare ẏeka sṇati acchi
yāhāki ca, ja, ṭa, jha, ṭha, ḍa, ḍha, ṇa, da, na pothimānaṅkare
nāhiṁ :–
śuṇa ho mahārājā akatīrthara kathā
arka daitaka māri ẏethe bijaẏe birañchi debatā |
yujheṣṭhi debe tāṁku kaleka bahuta tusti
jaẏatu parameśvara anādi mūrati | (abaśiṣṭāṁṣa parapr̥ṣṭhāre)
(pūbongpr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara)

jaẏatu parameśvara timira bidārantā |
jaẏatu parameśvara parama sānande
jaẏatu parameśvara jaẏatu paramānande |
jaẏatu parameśvara yugānteka kāḷa bañchā
jaẏatu parameśvara saẏaḷa jana sañchā |
jaẏatu parameśvara arka niśodhana
jaẏatu parameśvara jagata prabodhana |
jaẏatu parameśvara grahaṁka ādimūḷa
jaẏatu parameśvara anādi lokapāḷa |
jaẏatu parameśvara udaẏe giri pradakṣiṇa
jaẏatu parameśvara anādi nirañjana | 8 |
jaẏatu parameśvara dibasa abiśrāmi
jaẏatu parameśvara dibārātra bhrami |
jaẏatu parameśvara he sahasra kiraṇa
jaẏatu parameśvara meru pradakṣiṇa |
jaẏatu parameśvara dvādaśa nāma bahi
nirākara mūrati nātha tote na dekhanti kehi |
jaẏatu parameśvara anādi mārataṇḍa
yāhāra jyoti bikāśai sapata brahmāṇḍa |
gagana liṅga nātha saẏaḷa jana cintāmaṇi
tohora prasanne nātha samasta dina gaṇi |
nāśakara piara caraṇe namāmi
śūdramuni sāroḷa dāsa śate sahasra daṇḍa pariṇāmi |
lg.l: bābu śrīkr̥ṣṇa nandana śāmba ye kumara
dvārikāra rakṣā pāḷaka se pacchima dvāra | 1 |
mr̥rāśirā nakṣatra ye aṭai se dinara | 2 |
biṣṭi nāme karaṇa ye atigaṇḍa nāme yoga
śāmba kumara hoicchi pacchima dvāra rakṣā | 4 |
nārade boile kāhiṁ chanti tora svāmī | 5 |
bahana hoi yāi hariṁki bāratā kara bābu
kṣaṇeheṁ rahi nuārai āmbhe bhana hi yibu | 6 |
bhitaraku yibāku ta manā acchi mote | 9 |
āgyāṁ meṇṭiṇa muṁ kipari yibaiṁ pitā pāśa
tāhā śuṇi kope ye kampanti brahmaśiṣa | 10 |
yadyapi ẏe kathā na karibuṭi kumara
nicaẏe dvarikā āja muṁ dahibi tumbhara | 11 |
kumara boilā muni he kopa śāntikara
ẏete boli kumara ye paśilā anteśvara pura | 12 |
dvareṇa nārada munikaiṁ galā ye ruhāi
anteśvara pure kumara paśila bege yāṁ | 13 |
śāmba kumara bheṭilā pitāmātāṁka ratiraṅga beḷe
śāmba kumaraku se pratakṣe debī dekhi
ātmā baikulya hoilā svāmīra rasa bhagnakari
āre āre śāmba kumara kalu tu mandabuddhi
śarīre hou tora gaḷuta kuṣṭha byādhi | 18 |
se debaṁkara śāpa ke anyathā karipāru | 19 |
śāmbakumara boilā deba nuhaiṁ muṁ doṣī
ākāśara bāratā boli baḍa kaṭāḷile mote
muniṁkara kope deba muhiṁ kahi ailaiṁ tote | 13 |

15 premarase paśichanti debakīra bāḷa
śāmbakumara dekhilā mātāṁkara aṅgasaṅga meḷa |–(pāṭhāntara)
boile hari āge yāi kuhasi bahana
nohile mohora kope pura hoiba dahana | 24 |
svāmī bahane bije karibā nāradaṁka tahiṁ
kaḷahapriẏa muni na puṇa pura dahi | 25 |
bābu tote nāśakali re kaḷahapriẏa bole
ẏeheneka abastā bābure kehu kalā tuku | 27 |
nārāẏeṇa boile tumbhe kala yebaṇa kr̥tya
tumbhare nāśagalā mora anaṅga samāne putra | 28 |
muni boile tumbhe ta bhuta bhabiṣya gyāṁtā
raturi naārila ẏe mora kaṣaṇa bāratā | 29 |
bañchita na gaā tote mr̥talokara prakr̥ti | 30 |
śāmba kumaraku dekhi muni hoile bikaḷa
śrī mārataṇḍa debatā boli tāra nāma | 33 |
sātakoṭi tīrtha ye bijaẏe tahiṁ sabu
se koṇāarka tīrthe yāi birañchi sebibu | 34 |

div.note: cañchaḷa citta tora manuṣya prakr̥ti |–kha, ṇa

lg.l: āhāra maithuna nidrā tāra nāhiṁ kicchi
pabana āhāre se kumuda nāḍa bhakṣi | 36 |
mana bacana karttabye birañchi nārāẏaṇaṁku sebā
dvādaśa baraṣe se prasanna hoile ādidebā | 37 |
mahāguru śāpa gaḷuta koṣṭha hoilāka pāri | 38 |
āho yujheṣṭhira tu birañchi nāāẏaṇa kara sebā
prasanna hoantu tote birañchi nātha debā | 41 |
mārakaṇḍa boile bābu ẏe se rāmacaṇḍī
bābu sītaẏā haraṇa yahuṁ kalāka rābaṇa
mālyabanta pabongtuṁ śrīrāmaṁku āṇilā bīra hanumāna | 46 |
makara māsa prathama pakṣa pratipadāra dina
aśḷeṣā nakṣatra se dina bhr̥gubāra bidyamāna | 47 |
śrī rāmacandre ye bijaẏe kale ẏethe
śubhakhamba potile laṁkāku setubandha bādhabā nimante | 48 |

div.note: anubrate śarīru tāra jharai mauṣadhi |–jha, ka, kha

lg.l: boilā bho svāmī ẏethi śubhadebāra hoilā akāraṇa | 49 |
pūbong katki prakr̥ti śaṁkā bhūmi nirādhāra | 50 |
bandha lāgiba yāiṁ maraḍā śāḷa bhūmi | 51 |
jyoti bījamantre pūjile śrīrāma caṇḍī nāma | 53 |
ẏe maudadhire srānakari piṇḍa diel raghunāthe
ẏe rāmakuṇḍe mukatiṭi hoile rājā daśarathe | 55 |
śīrāmakuṇḍe srānakari rāmacaṇḍī toṣile yeseneke bidhi | 56 |
śuṇa ho caitana tahuṁ bijekale dharmasute
mārkaṇḍe boile bābu maudadhire srāhāna kara
śuṇa ho yujheṣṭhi debe badaẏanti mārakaṇḍe

div.note: yogīra mantre pūjākale deba rāmacaṇḍī nāma |–kha, ṇa, ka,na
rāmakuṇḍe srāhāna rāmacaṇḍī prabodhi |–ṭa, ñja

lg.l: bābu brahmāṁkara putra ye yamanika maharuṣi
se yamanika maharuṣi ārohile tāra piṭhi | 62 |
pātāla sutaḷa sahite ye mahī nabakhaṇḍa | 63 |
baiśampāẏana boile muṁ sandhyā karibāra beḷe
yuge yuge thāa tuhi sehi bhmabanara | 70 |
pitāra kope se ye nicaḷa hoilā

div.note: aneka sneha tāṁku karanti debakāśī |–ṭa, cha, jha
baiśampāẏena boile uṁ srāna karibāra beḷe |–ka, ṭha

lg.l: brahmāra nandana ẏe ye śrīliṅga yameśvara
mārakaṇḍe boile bābu śuṇa tu yujheṣṭhi
bhārā nirṇṇekari nāśibe se āpaṇāra bongśa
laṁkāgaḍa rābaṇaku dile śrīmukha lekhana goṭiẏe
śrīmukha gheni laṁkāku galā bāḷira tanaẏe | 79 |
laṁkāgaḍe yāiṁ ye bahuta pratagyāṁ kalā
rābaṇara mathāru se bhāñji āṇilā mukuṭa
śrīrāmacandraṁkara chāmure mukuṭa chāḷa nei thoi
aṅgada boilā svāmī para mana jāṇu debarāja | 85 |

div.note: mandodarī keśa dhailā bibhīṣaṇa uttare |–jha, tha, ja
aṅgada boilā mo mana jāṇu tuhi daśaratha ā(?) |–ka, ta

lg.l: kisa bara māgibi muṁ jāṇi anugraha kara
ke ke jāṇi pārilaṭi ẏehāra ye mana
jāmbana boilā svāmī tumbhe se sabong jāṇa | 88 |
trailokya cintāmaṇi nātha to tahuṁ āna nāhiṁ | 89 |
mane mane aṅgada ye māgai bākya siddha
boilā mohora hāthe svāmī hoiba tumbhe badha | 91 |
boilā aṅgada re muṇḍa tora pakāibi moḍi | 92 |
dvāpara yuge ẏehāra hāthe chāḍibu āmbhe tanu | 93 |
āho aṅgada bāñchā siddha āmbhe karibu tohora
ẏe āmbhara satya satya aṭai yathārtha
dvāpare śarīra bisarjibu tohroa ye hātha | 95 |
śuṇa ho yujheṣṭhi ye badaẏanti mārakaṇḍe
se aṅgada jārā nāme śabara ye hoicchiṭi madhyasvarge | 96 |
se jārā śabara ye āsiba mr̥gaẏā
mr̥ga loḍante dekhiba se keśabara pādachāẏā | 97 |

div.note: aṅgada ambhanta ye māgilā sadibhāba |–kha, ṇa, na

sugri hanumanta ye mahākopa kari
boile aṅgada re āja tora muṇḍa pakāibuṁ moḍi |–ka, ta

lg.l: se nārāja paḍiba yāiṁ keśabara pāda tale | 98 |
āgyāṁ debe hari śabara re arjune rāiāṇa
caraṇa dekhi kirāta kariba bahu tusti
arjunara hātha dhari chāḍibe pañchu prāṇa
piṇḍa dahana kariba arjuna yamunā kūḷeṇa | 102 |
ākāśara bāṇi ye paḍiba bīra arjunaku
ẏehi kaḷebara thāu samudre mela debarājā
nīḷasundara pabongte kaḷiyuge ghenime ẏe pūjā | 104 |
se piṇḍa lāgiba āsi bārānidhira uttara kūḷe
se jārā śabara pūjā karibaṭi sabongkāḷe | 106 |
brahmā saṅgate basibe sohodrā rūpa dhari | 108 |
kaḷiyuga chārilakṣa batiśa sahasra baraṣa pariyante
baudha rūpe pūjā pāibe nīḷasundara pabongte | 109 |
lg.note: nārāja binddhaba se sandhyāyukta kāḷe |–cha, tha, jha

lg.l: ẏe śaiḷa meḷa chāḍi kimpe aila ẏethaku | 110 |
yujheṣṭhi debe pabongtaku kale bahuta pūjā
tuhi se giribara nārāẏaṇa rūpe pūjā | 111 |
sodara boli garuḍa āmbhanta ailāka gheni | 115 |
nārāẏeṇa prasanne mora nāma cinha rahilā | 116 |
dvāpara yuge dvādaśa lakṣa yojana mora sthaḷī
muhiṁ yebe nija kāẏā bikāśili rūpa
mama teja lāgiṇa ye āditya hoileka gopya | 119 |
se nimante tusti mote kalāka birañchi

lg.note: yujheṣṭhi puccthā karanti nīḷasundara pabongtaku |–kha, ṇa, ka, ta
mama abhyantare gamaiṁ aṁśumāḷi |–ca, cha

(sataraśata, teraśata, dvādaśaśata daśa yojana, dvādaśa
yojana prabhr̥ti pāṭhāntara acchi)

lg.l: śate caka nibongāṇa mohora rathe ādi
aneśata rathacaka bhājilā tohora śikhare lāgi | 122 |
dakṣiṇa diga pantha teji muṁ gamili uttara diga puntha | 123 |
muhiṁ tohora bhaẏe upekṣili dakṣiṇa panthabhumi
tohora gopyagale ye pārai muhiṁ gami | 124 |
tu ẏebe giribara gopyakara nija kāẏe
tretaẏā yuge muhiṁ markata maṇi rūpa | 126 |
nārāẏeṇa pādukā hoibi muṁ bāluṁkā sarūpa | 128 |
śuṇa ho yujheṣṭhi deba badaẏanti nīḷagiri
mama draśane ye aśvamedha yāga sari | 129 |
muhiṁ se bahi pārai nārāẏeṇaṁka teja | 131 |
āho yujheṣṭhi muhiṁ se nārāẏaṇaṁku bahantā
mo bitrake āna nāhiṁ nā sahantā | 133 |
kuṇḍa gaṇḍa bhedi ẏehi se mote sāṅgī | 134 |
nabakoṭi tīrtha gheni ye kṣetrādhi puṣkara
maudadhi śvetagaṅga mārakaṇḍa indra ye yāmuni
koṭiẏe tīrtha gheni ẏe nīḷa kalpabaṭeṇa bhrami | 137 |
nānātīrtha jaḷa gami hoile ẏethe bhedī | 138 |
sakaḷa tīrtha pāridaṇḍa maudadhi se rājā
kr̥ṣṇa koṭiẏe abatāre yāhāku karanti pūjā | 139 |
samasta tīrtha ye ẏethire achanti nabakoṭi
bābu śuṇa ho yujheṣṭhi ẏe śvetagaṅgara mahimāṁ
ẏethuṁ utapatti hoile śveta nāme brahmā | 143 |
ẏe śvetagaṅga maudadhi tīrthe tapa kalā dhātā
bābu prajāpati daibata ẏe rohiṇī kuṇḍagoṭi
ākāśa mekhaḷā ẏethe ananta tīrtha bheṭi | 145 |
lg.note: puṇyatoẏā abagrāhī ye pañchu bāhinī |–a, na, jha, ṇa
ananta koṭi tīrtha se yāhaku karai pūjā |–ṭa, ṭha, jha, ñja
ārekaromake ye mr̥gabhadrā tīrhageṭi |–na, ṇa, ca, kha

lg.l: sandhyā abakāśe samasta saṅgama hvanti ẏethi | 147 |
brahmāṁkara āsana aṭe ẏe śvetagaṅgā tīrtha
indra yāmunika tīrthare indra debatāra basā
ẏe tini debatānta dekhite saburi manīṣā | 149 |
bābu śateka praḷaẏeṭi pr̥thī nāśa yāẏe
ẏe tīrthe lucai samasta debatāṁka kāẏe | 150 |
maudadhiru yāmunika tīrtha pariyante yetedūra bāli
samasta debatāra astiẏe muṁ pratakṣe dekhili | 151 |
kāraṇaku mātra bāṭa ẏe bhumi tinisvarge | 152 |
bābu debataẏe mr̥tu icchanti yebaṇa bhūmi
caturddaśa bhmabana bhrami nārāẏeṇa ẏetheṁ biśrāmi | 153 |
parama pada chāḍi pāṣāṇḍe kiṁpe āna icchākari | 154 |
ẏe pañchutīrtha yeni tu maudadhire abagāha | 155 |
bābu uttara dakṣiṇa pūbong pacchima ẏe chāridiga

lg.l: rātra thāuṁ maune sāriba prakr̥ti śaṁkā | 179 |

bāchā na uccāri kariba danta ye dhāpane | 184 |

lg.l: mauna brata kari tejiba stirī taiḷa āmiṣa
mithya na kahiba na paśiba ẏe māẏā saṁsāre | 190 |
taiḷa na ghenima na yiba stirī pāśa
sukhe taiḷa lagāilā se śukḷa cauṭhi dibase | 193 |
go brāhmaṇa chāṇḍāḷa sahite samasta kalā bhakṣa | 195 |
aneka jība nāśakalā se ādhāra nimante
satyayuga satara lakṣa aṭhāśi sahasra baraṣa
tretaẏā yuga bāralakṣa chaẏāṇoī sahasra baraṣa ye śeṣa | 197 |

lg.l: makara māse srāhāna kale br̥ndaspatiṁka dulaṇī
habiṣya bhojana ye kariba sandhyā abakāśe | 202 |
uā chāuḷa guḍakara anna hāde bhmaṁji | 203 |
rāndhaṇā bidhānaku na yogāiṭi dhabaḷa labaṇa | 204 |
agasti gaicha śāka muga sāru miśā
śākaarṇṇa hoiba akaṭā abaṭā yete sañchi
bābu māgha māhātmyare ẏesaneka yugati acchi | 206 |
prakr̥ti śaṁkā danta dhāpana srāhāna bhojana tinisandhyā
mauna brata hoiba na kariba pāpa bādhā | 207 |
atithi abhyāgata bhikṣuka jana dāde yete
nirāśa na kariba deuthiba ude asta pariyante | 208 |
dibārātre bañchiba ẏekā mādhabakaiṁ kari laẏe
ghr̥ta jāgara jāḷi niśi bañchiba ẏekadhyāẏe | 210 |
śarīre na bahiba tāmasa ye br̥tti
kadācite na bhābiba pāpa ye prakr̥ti | 211 |
lg.note:
śarīre na bahiba tāmasa ye mūrtti
kadācite na bhābiba beśyā saṅga prīti |–ja, jha
lg.l: śuṇa ho yujheṣṭhi sujana hou ki kujana hou abā
sujana kujana boli kenhe bāribāka ẏehā | 213 |
meru mekhaḷuṁ ye saṅgama houchanti sāgara | 214 |
meru mekhaḷe uṭhi debatāẏe pakhāḷuchanti aṅga
tahiṁra radeka āsi sāgare houchanti saṅga | 215 |
tiniśa sāṭhiẏe dina bahai yebaṇa jaḷa
akāśuṁ patita samodra sāhitā sujaḷa jaḷa boli
puṣkariṇī gaṇḍa khāla kupa ẏehāku jaḷa kahili | 217 |
āho caitana puṣkariṇīre srāhāna kale pāñchabhāga hoi dharma

lg.note:
“purāṇa saṅgate nityakarmahiñ karibā” ehi padapare
“kha” pothire bhinna pāṭha :–
yujheṣṭhi puccthākale ho śuṇa mahāmanyu
keuṁṭhāre srāna kale hoẏe kete puṇya |
tāhā śuṇi mārakaṇḍe bolanti bacana
tīrthesrāna kale hoẏe chāripāda dharma |
sabongdāṭi yeuṁ nadī bahiyāu thāi
tahiṁ srānakale ye tinipāda dharma hoi |
ākāśuṁ paḍiṇa jaḷa yāẏe samudraku
sadhye rahile ḍāga kahanti tāhāku |
tahiṁ srānakale benibhāga dharma hoi
ẏeka bhāga puṣkaraṇī srānare achai |
kīrttikalā loka tinibhāga pāi dharma
bhāgeka miḷai ye karāi srāna karma |
lg.l: tini bhāga prāpata hoai dharma kalā lokaku
sāta bhāga dharma hoai nadī srāhānaku | 219 |
bābu mārkaṇḍeẏaśvara ẏe tīrthaṁkara aṭai ādi
pañchatīrthara nābhi maṇḍaḷa ẏethe hāde bhedi | 220 |
ẏethira pacchime srāna kale pūbong ye mūrati
nābhi maṇḍaḷuṁ adhika ẏe gaṅgāṁẏe paśile
mātr̥ haraṇa doṣa pāiba ẏethi bhale | 222 |
ẏe māgha māhātmya ye kahai muṁ tote | 224 |
bābu naba karmaṇa puruṣa ẏe bitrānta kāẏe
parama nirākuḷa puruṣa ẏehāra nāhiṁ ātaẏāẏe | 227 |
ẏe puṣkara debatā hoile kṣetra ādhipati | 228 |
ẏe makara tiriśa dibase ye karai srāhāna

lg.note: makara meṣa tula tinimāsare jalagāmī |–ka, ta
lg.l: bābu ẏe māgha māsara srāhāna phaḷaśr̥ti
bārānidhi nāẏeka se bhaṇḍāra kare rakṣā | 233 |
kaḷaṁka citte srāhāna kalā ye kr̥tānta
nāśakara puruṣa se hoile yama daibata | 234 |
rudra debatāẏe kale mātr̥ haraṇa doṣa
matramāsa srāhāne mahādebara pāpa galā dhvaṁsa | 235 |
bābu bichāri māgha srāhana kalāka bhūtasvāmī
bābu bāsuki nāga makare srāhāna se kari
śaṅkha padma mahāpadma śvetapadma kuḷika takṣaka ananta
makara māsara srāhānara phale dvādaśa biśvadebā
makara srāhāna kale unamata ruṣira tanu
udaẏa kāḷa bākye hoile sanaka sapata manu | 240 |
candra debatākaiṁ pradāna kalā satāiśa dohitī | 242 |
se candra rohiṇīra tule aneka pīrati
chabiśa kanyāra se na galāka kati | 243 |
chabiśa kanyāṁkara tāpe prakāpati candraku kale kopa
dohitāṁkara bikaḷe se dacha rāgeṇa dile śāpa | 244 |
prajāpati boiel tote kāmuka puruṣa boli
tahiṁra nimante tote satāiśa kanyākaiṁ dili | 245 |
chabiśa kanyākuiṁ mora tu kalu ye durubhāgī
ẏehāṁkara dukhe tora tanu cchinna hou | 247 |
se anādi puruṣa mahātamāra ati mahākope
tatakṣaṇe candra gaḷita hoilā prajāpatira śāpe | 248 |
prabhāsa pusukara jale makara māse candra deiṁṇa paḍilā
bāhuḍi candra debatāra tanu kaaṁḷi uṭhilā
māgha srāhāna phaḷe se udaẏe hoilā | 250 |
dakṣara chabiśa kanyā yahuṁ thilā se upekṣi
māgha srāhānara phaḷe se ubhaẏe kāma icchi | 251 |
daibata puruṣa hoi ākāśe ude hele | 252 |
sanaka sanandana sanātana kapila kumāra śatamanu | 253 |
kaḷapī puruṣa hile se ananta mūrati | 254 |
makara māsa srāhāna karai kāmadeba kṣetrapāḷa

lg.note: tanu cchinna hoile tohore abhogī |–tha, ñja

ādi brahmāṁkara ye upujile sāta tanu

lg.l: āho bābu yujheṣṭhi makara māsa srāhāna sukr̥tara phaḷe
kaṇḍa kaṇve kapiḷa satyapā ruṣiśiṅga aṅgara | 258 |
gālaba lomaśa byāsa jaẏemuni śukabrahmā baiśampāẏana
makara māsa srāhāna phaḷuṁ āmbhanta yuga ẏekadina | 259 |
śuṇa bābu yujheṣṭhi satyayuge daccha prajāpati
bahuta dāna dilā rāja santāna jāta arthe
daśa sahasra barasa pariyante alokita dharma kalā

lg.note: bahuta yagayagyaṁ kari rājā bhaṇḍāra bidhvaṁse |–ta, jha, tha, ḷa

lg.l: debatā brāhmaṇaṁka br̥tti harilā bara ẏe rāge | 268 |
aneka dūṣita kalā nāma dharma nāhiṁ
āho yubanāśva rājāra anīti dekhiṇa sabongr̥ṣi
svāmī mr̥tu maṇḍaḷe ye icchākuru baṁśe
aneka dharme tāra ye nohilā santati | 273 |
putra abhābe rājā pāilā bahuta dukha
debatā brāhmaṇaṁka br̥tti harilā hoiṇa bimukha | 274 |
ābara tniyuge br̥ttidāna dharma ki rahiba | 275 |
āmbhe yubanāśva rājākaiṁ debu putra sañchi | 276 |
bāramāsara madhye ye makara māsa siddhi
se puṇye tāhākaiṁ putreka debuṁ ye sampādi | 277 |
bbu āśvina kārttika mārgaśīra puṣamāsa ante
maghā nakṣatra se ye bāra br̥haspati | 280 |
bāḷaba nāme karaṇa biska mbha nāme yoga
tribeṇī saṅgame se paśile deba dhātā | 282 |
nirmaḷ ajaḷ aghaṭeka āṇile deba toḷi
mahāmantre mantrile santiti jāta heba boli | 283 |
se jaḷaghaṭa nei thoile dr̥mana giri śikhare | 285 |
śāẏeḍā br̥kṣeka acchi se giri upare
ādi anta śūnya se aṭai nirākuḷa | 287 |
gagana mārge ye lāgiacchi tāra rekhā | 288 |
tahiṁra upare dhātā thoile jaḷa ghaṭa toḷi | 289 |
boile ẏehā nei samarpiba yubanāśva rājāku
ẏe jaḷa āpyāna karāu tāhāra bhāriyāku | 291 |
mahā baḷiṣtha hoiba se trailokya jagajjitā | 292 |
ẏeṇe yubanāśva bhramai bipunye mr̥gaẏā kāraṇe | 293 |
jaḷara bihune kṣobha pāilā tāra dehā | 294 |
loḍante mantrībara na pāilā joḍa khāla
goleka dr̥kṣa upare dekhilā jaḷa ghāṭeka nirmaḷa | 286 |
br̥kṣa upare uṭhiṇa tāhā kāṛhiṇa ye āṇi
dekhiḷāka ghaṭare atianta śītaḷa nirmaḷa pāṇi | 287 |
gheniṇa mantrībara āsai tāhā kandhare kari
rājāra chāmure dilā bahana se bāri | 298 |
ātroṣi yubanāśva jaḷa piilā ati bege | 299 |
kāhiṁ pāilu ẏe jaḷ apratakṣe amr̥ta | 300 |
śuṇ aho yujheṣṭhi deba badanti mārakaṇḍe
baśiṣṭha paulasti yāi pabeśa yaśobantī brahmāṇḍe | 302 |
bhrāti kale ki se yubanāśva rājā kathā | 303 |
brahmā boile tumbhe caḷa yā bahana
santati jaḷaghaṭa thoi ailuṁ br̥ndāarka bana | 304 |
se jaḷa āpyāna karib tāhara banitā
br̥ndāarka bane khoji loḍi na pāile | 307 |
dhtāra agrate se kahile bege yāiṁ
seāmī santaka achai jaḷaghaṭi tahiṁ nāhiṁ | 308 |
na puṇa piai tāhā asura baḷabantā | 309 |
putreka jāta hoiba nr̥pati jībana heba naṣṭa | 311 |
garbhare rājāra ye rahilā putra mahābaḷabantā
tumbhe yāi rājāku kaha na karu se cintā | 312 |
chāriheṁ prabeśa hoile yāi yubanāśva rājāra agrete | 313 |
hr̥dagate bichārai aputrika heli kisa hāde ruṣa | 314 |
baṁśa rakṣā hoiba tu na dekhibu putragoṭi | 316 |
ruṣiṁkara bacana se nr̥pati kalā heḷa
ẏehimati bhaṇḍa mote mohora hoilā caturtha abasthā kāḷa | 317 |
dibase aḷasa deha rājāra rātre jvara khaṇḍi
āhāra na rucai rājāra dehe aḷaṁkāra na maṇḍi | 320 |
peṭa bhāri dekhi rājā uddeśya karai baidya
mahā mahā badyamane mauṣadhi dianti yete yete
hutāśane paḍile yenhe tr̥ṇa hoẏe dhvaṁsi | 323 |
dinu dinuṁ rājāra deha hoilā aśakata
kāhākaiṁ gocara ye nohai ẏe kathā
bolanti rājā br̥tti haraṇa kalā ruṣi brāhmaṇa debatā | 326 |
debīṁki poḍha meṣa chāgaḷa maiṁṣi mandāra
aneka sambhare se karanti baḷibhojā yogāḍa bichāra | 329 |
kaḍā ghumurā ḍhola ye mr̥daṅga dāmaṇḍi
nohoi śānti rājā duguṇa hoilā kaṣṭa
baiśākha śukaḷa cauṭhi dina bheṭile byāsa ye baśiṣṭha | 331 |
haṁsulī tuḷi supāti, kariṇa rāẏe tejyā
yubanāśva rājā boila muni he dekha mohora kaṣṭa | 333 |
tohora garbhe ho āna nāhiṁ kicchi
tu yahuṁ harilu br̥tta bāḍi debatā brāhmaṇa
samaste guhāri kalu āmbhe pitāmaha āgeṇa | 337 |
santāna jaḷaghaṭa kalu rājā tohora nimante
yatane āṇi thoilu br̥ndāarka banasta golaka br̥kṣe
se jaḷaghaṭa mantrī āṇidilāka tohora ye hāthe | 339 |
mr̥gaẏā kāḷe tr̥ṣāre piilu se to garbhe putreka rahilā
muhiṁ pache marai mohora hou bāḷaśiṣi | 342 |
ẏe ayodhyā sūryyabaṁśa rahiba se hoiba rājana | 343 |
pitā ki sahi pārai garbhara bhārā yete | 344 |
sehi se sahi pārai nā garbhara ārddoḷi | 345 |
kṣaṇe kṣaṇe aceta rājā paḍai bhūmigata | 346 |
bho bedabyāse muṁ ẏethuṁ kemante hoibi ye pāra | 347 |
byāse boile rājā tu pāiluni kāraṇa
jībante mukta ẏebe biṣṇu purāṇa śuṇa | 348 |
kahanti byāse ye bhuta bhabiṣya gyāṁtā
samarājya loka gheni yubanāśya rājā hoilāka śrotā | 349 |
saptama māse rājāra hoilāka garbha mahābhāri
kṣaṇa kṣaṇake mohagata rājā sahita nuāri | 350 |
makara kumbha mīna meṣa br̥ṣa mithuna kakaḍā māse
mahā paṇḍita putre se yogalagna bichāri
uṁkāri śabada ye garjana nāda kari
janma hoilā putra ye pañjarā bidāri | 356 |
maha baḷabantā yahuṁ kumara janma hoilā
yubanāśva rājā putrakaiṁ dekhi prāṇa bisarjilā | 357 |
teṇu mānadhātā nāma dile baśiṣṭha prohita | 360 |
se mānadhātā rājā icchākuru bongśe ude
satyayuge chārilakṣa baraṣa rājā rājyakalā hāde | 361 |
dharma artha kāma mokṣa ẏetheṁ prāpata caudharma | 362 |
makara srāhāna phaḷe se mānadhātā catrabratī
mahā pratāpī hilā se pr̥thīre ẏekakṣetrī | 363 |
uttara kośaḷe se ye ayodhyā nagra purī
uttara kośaḷe se prabeśa helā āsi | 365 |
se rājyeṇa paśi se lagāilā bahati
se rājye na lāgilā agniteja jyoti | 366 |
yahuṁ jui lagāile rājya na poḍilā
tahuṁ se ayodhyā nāme nagreka hoilā | 367 |
yujheṣṭhi boile śuṇa ho ma rakaṇḍa yati
prabāha bāhu cañchaḷa meghara barṇṇa parakāśi | 370 |
trailokya mohe se mānadhātāra ye rūpa
mahāchatrī bidyā tu mānadhātākaiṁ āsa yā śikhāi | 372 |
bhāgyabara āsi se ye prasanna hoile | 375 |
dhanu śahasra gadābidyā māla ye bindhāṇa
kaḷī meghā aśva caḍha se banasteśa khedi | 377 |
duṣṭaku nāśi se diga bijaẏera madhye
mahā mahā yoddhāmānanta jiṇai se raṇa sādhye | 378 |
śuṇa ho yujheṣṭhi kahanti mārakaṇḍa yati
bāhu baḷa prātrame aṭai se rājā
yāga yagyaṁ kari se pāḷai samasta | 381 |
yāhāra yisa bāñcchā pāḷanti jāṇa meghe
brahmāẏe dile se candra maṇḍaḷa dhanu
se dhanu gheniṇa rājā bhramai tinibhmabana
se pabongta phuṭi śahasra galā antargatā | 389 |
bibudhe sadhu sādhu kale mānadhātāra śara dekhi
sādhu sādhu ho mānadhātā āmbhakaiṁ pāribu tu rakhi | 390 |
puṣyeka rathe basāi mānadhātāku āṇa mora pura | 392 |
prabeśa hoile yāiṁ mānadhātā rājāra sannidhāne | 393 |
ẏe puṣyeka rathe tu debasabhāku yibu | 395 |
puṣyeka caḍhi se mānadhātā meru āśrame
īśvara bara prasāde āmbhakaiṁ rābaṇa dhvaṁsi | 398 |
puṇa sehi bongśare jāta hoilā yayāti
lakṣe ṣāṭhiẏe śahasra barṣa khaṭilā dibārāti | 401 |
tohora upara baṁśe dilīpa āẏe thilā
karṇṇakūṭa pabongta binddhalu dekhiluṁ se tohora yogyatā | 403 |
tohoreṇa niścinte thibu ye āmbhe svarge
ājahuṁ rakṣā karibu bhmabana svarga svabhābe | 404 |
āpaṇāra abhiṣeka mukuṭa nei mānadhātā śire bānddha | 406 |
śrībhmaje śrīpaẏare nānā beśa aḷaṁkāra nei
ajaṅga dhanu akṣaẏe troṇa dile nei | 408 |
khecarī bibāna ye durgāṁka tahiṁ thilā
jantunātha pūjā kalā bahuta śasra gheni | 412 |
dhātā boile tote deli dibā cakṣu
amr̥ta hoiba tu yete drabya bhakṣu | 413 |
