lg.l: gopāḷaṁka hāka śuṇi nandara kopa baḍhi
pāñchabeḷa brahāra kala se śrīharira kāẏe | 168 |
kaṣṭhora dekhiṇa brahmā batsānta dile āṇi | 169 |
hambāraba kariṇa ye dhāmanti sabong bacchā
āho bedabara tu aṭu ẏeḍe manda | 173 |
yadyapi batsānta tu ho harilu kutūhoḷe
dhātikāre na dilu tu kiṁpe nandara kaṭāḷe | 174 |
kahuṁ kahuṁ keśaba ye brahmāṁku śāpyadile rāge
boile tuho brahmā apujyaka hua madhyasvarge | 176 |
nārāẏaṇa kopa dekhi brahmā paḷāilā ḍare
jana ādaraṇe kari janārddana nāma bahu | 178 |
taba kalākarma ẏebe samaste ẏethi bhābi | 180 |
baḍhili mūrkhapaṇe muṁ na jāṇai kicchi
abhyārtha hoi śrī puruṣottama caraṇe sebi
śrijagannāthaṁka caraṇa śaraṇa śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsa kabi | 183 | | 11506 |
lg.head: {@satīstrīra upākhyāna@}

lg.l: muhiṁ tumbha dasara dāsa bhr̥tyara bhr̥tya muni
āho manu puruṣa yāhā tuhi achu pucchi
kāhuṁ yibe agyāṁtabāsa baraṣe teradina acchi | 5 |
biṣṭa nāme karaṇa gaṇḍa nāme yoga
ādihuṁ sehinuṁ banabāsa barabarasa ye bhoga | 8 |
byāse dhaumya purohite achanti mātra sāhi | 9 |
chenā adhāma sara dadhi guṭikā labaṇī | 11 |
ruṣimānanta se santoṣe dianti ye bhojā
pāde praṇapatya hoiṇa śuti boile dharmarāja | 13 |
aneka tīrtha kalāiṁ muṁ manara haraṣa | 14 |
pāpabādhā karmaṇa mote ghoṭilā āsi āja | 15 |
svāmī tumbhe samaẏeke ẏebe yibā anyadeśe
trodhe gada gada hoi kahanti dharmarāẏe śiṣi
babu agyāṁte tumbhe bañchiba keuṇahiṁ deśe | 18 |
lg.note: sāhi–sahitare (saṅgatare) |
khaṇḍaśākara ye kandamūḷa dārākṣa |–kha, ṇa, na, ṭha

lg.l: tuhi sbunti cihnibu tote kehi ye cihna | 19 |
yebe āmbhara śāhāsra mantra aṭaiṭi sata
ẏe āmbhara āśiṣa tuku hou parāpata | 20 |
aneka sānanda āmbhe hoithāuṁ tote dekhi
aneka dānaba māri āmbha tapa takhi | 21 |
śuṇa go mahāsvatī kahai tora āge
baotaraṇī nadīkūḷe rudrapura bolikari ẏekai śāsane
catubongeda śāhasre tāku ke nāhiṁ jiṇantā | 27 |

lg.note: mora toṣe tote gopī karatnu laśānu |–kha, ṇa, ja

prāṇeśvara tahiṁ ẏekai liṅgagoṭi
ananta nabhiru se pratakṣeṇa phuṭi |–ṇa
prāṇeśvara, rāmeśvara ẏepari bhinma nāma acchi |–gha, kha, na
lg.l: yeuṁṇa brāhmaṇa aṣṭādaśa puāṇa śāhāsre mahābhigyaṁ
se brāhmaṇa bhāriyāra nāma aṭe satyā
kauśika brāhmaṇahuṁ tāhara āne nāhṁ mati
se satīki hari loḍanti se capaḷa janamāne | 32 |
dūtikā preṣaṇe chālanti bahuta ye drabya
nāgarī prabeśa yāiṁ se satīra sannidhāne
raṁjaka āṁgocha pinddha paśu taiḷa mukhe śāmaḷī | 36 |
se satīki dekhi bolai basibā ẏethi daṇḍe | 37 |
lg.note: “kauśika paṇḍāṁka nagreṇa beda paḍhi” pare “ṇa” pothire bhinmapāṭha :=
dūtakārī basiacchi svatī sannidhāne
āḍakhoṣā pāḍihāthe gheniacchi bahu ratne
brāhmaṇaku dekhi dūtakārī pherigalā
se dina brāhmaṇa ye gr̥hare rahiā |
rajaka gharu basra pinddha sukhe caḷi |–ca,
rajaka aṁśe śāṛhī kasṇarī dehe boli |–ka,
rajakara āṁgocha pinddha taḷe loṭe śāḍhī |–ṭa
kuñchikari āṁgucchi pinddha basa praśaste sukeh kheḷi |–jha,
lg.l: oḷigi śuti boila āgo paṇḍi āṇiẏe
parasta rī prasaṅge puṇa aṭanti baḍa khara | 39 |
tumbhanta upekṣi kiṁpe āne bhajanti pāpa parakr̥ti | 40 |
tāhāṁkara ẏe anīti tumbhe kisa kara
tumbhe pariyoga noha kiṁpe āna saṅgatara | 41 |
ẏe nagra brāhmaṇamānaṁka upareṇa se rāja
e tumbhant adekhile go srāhānara kāḷe
baḍalokara pua go se sundara baḷabantā
tiriśi baraṣa baẏasa se śr̥ṅgāreṇa śaaktā | 44 |
yibā ki āmbhe go mohora gharayāẏe
apara drabya go baḍhāibā bhala bhojā | 46 |
āiṣa kṣīnna hoilāni ẏe tohora śarīra

lg.note: tumbhanta chāḍi kiṁpe āne baḷānti mati |–ṇa, ṭha

tumbhe saṁyoga, yoga, bhoga bihaḍakara pāṭhāntara sthāna
biśvṣare dekhāyāe |

āẏi go pāpa gaḷita śarīra go aṭai tohori
ẏeḍeka baẏase go ẏeḍeka dochārī |–cha, ṭa, ña
lg.l: muhim patibrata go ye na chuaiṁ āna
ālo pāpiṣṭhā dochāruṇī tu bahana hoi paḷā
beśyāhoi mukhare ree karāi purāṇa paṇḍāẏe āsanti kahile | 51 |
aneka bhracchana kari debī dile gāḷi
puṇi puṇa pratiuttara se diai jaṁjāḷī | 52 |
biṇḍā kuruḷi deiṇa beḍhi pāḍilāka bobi
ẏehimati tā tahiṁki peṣale aneka dūtī
tanu kṣīṇa brāhmaṇa ye annara abhabe
bhikṣāhiṁ na miḷilā daiba kaṣaṇa bhābe | 57 |

lg.note:
ālo pāpeṣṭhī dochāruṇī tu bahana ẏetha yā yā
āna stirīku ẏe dhana neiṇa tu majjā |–ka

gauroba bhājilā tāra hoilā bhikṣāsī
bhikṣāmāgi bulai se nagrapure paśi |–ña, ka
lg.l: kāhārihiṁ bacana se na karai patibratā
kauśika daridra brāhmṇa huṁ nāhiṁ āna bhrathā | 59 |
se svatira brata nāśa karibāra buddhi
kauśika brāhmaṇa dehe karāile gaḷuta kuṣṭhabyādhi | 60 |
tapata jaḷa gheni svatī patī pakhāḷai tāra kāẏe
se durgandha maṇai ye krapūra bāsa prāẏe | 62 |
komaḷa patra pāḍi se brāhmaṇakaiṁ śuāi
nagre paśiṇa se bhikṣā māgaṇa āṇai | 63 |
pañchu grāsa māgina se na pai taṇḍuḷa ẏekamāṇa | 64 |
yānteṇa sundarī anya nagre bhikṣā māgi
kāmadeba parāẏeka hoi puruṣe bāṭe thānti jagi | 65 |
āgo tirī ratnakānti ye ẏe tohora baẏasa
kuṣṭhiā brāhmaṇa chāra ki tohora nija pati

lg.note:
“kauśika brāhmaṇa dehe karaile gaḷuta kuṣṭha byādha”
pare ‘ṇa’ pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
kuṣṭhabyādhi brāhmaṇa go tohora ye pati
taha chāraku go ārādhanā karu tu go niti
śarada pūrṇṇamī śaśī ẏe tohora badana
kiṁpāiṁ gañjāi tu go nakahu bacana
sukha upekṣi kiṁpāiṁ yatune hou dukhī
icchā kiṁpe nakaru go āmbhara rūpa dekhi |

lg.l: śaradhā na baḷai ki āmbhara rūpe dekhi | 68 |
se kuṣṭhabyādhi brāhmaṇakaiṁ ājahuṁ kara paratejyā
ẏe ratnamāna biḷasī go āmbara hoasi bhāriyā | 69 |
goḍāi bolanti se āga ogāḷanti puṇapuṇi
badhirana śuṇai yehne kambura śabada baṇī | 71 |
svatī boile ho tumbhe duṣṭe baḍa thāpī
hīna āchāra puruṣe tumbhe yata sata loḍa bhmañja
baḷatkāra kale kehu acchi tora pāśe | 74 |
keuṁṇa pātaka lāgaba lāgu āsi pache | 75 |
nārāẏaṇa bāḷuta rūpe ye bhratha khaṇḍa bhrami
gauroba mānitī stirīnta ye sabuntihiṁ rami | 76 |
āpaṇe haraṇa kalā ẏetheṁ śrībanta puruṣa
ẏe bhūmire caubiṁśa juṇa pariyente na lāgai parastirī haraṇa doṣa | 77 |
svatī boile pāpaku bhaẏe na karanti duṣṭajana
mote nachuaṁ boli tuṁbhaṁnta tote purarabāṁkara rāṇa | 78 |
lg.note: āpaṇe haraṇa kalā abikāra puruṣā |–ṇa, na
ẏe bhmabire paradārā haraṇa doṣa nāhiṁ yojana pañchāśa |–ka, tha
lg.l: bihantā puruṣe śuṇi kale mane bhaẏe
dropatī debī boile śuṇa sudeba sunu
kāḷe kemanta hoilā se kauśika brāhmaṇara tanu | 81 |
svatīra brataku aṭai dharmara kaṣaṇa sina | 82 |
dvājā nāme nakṣatra ye beḷa nabaghaṭi | 83 |
saba aḷaṁkāra beśa hoiṇa se nāceṇī gāẏeṇī
se beśyāmāne yāuchanti dhūpa ye khaṭaśi | 84 |
tāhānta dekhi hasilā se kauśika brāhmaṇa
ẏemānanta kete muṁ karināhiṁ ki ramaṇa | 85 |
svatī boile svāmī kimarthe tumbhara hāsī
brāhmaṇa boilā tu go śuṇa śubhrakeśī | 86 |
yebe beśyākaiṁ nātha kala tumbhe icchā
brāhmaṇa boilā satyā tu ẏeḍeka agyāna bāi
mo durgandhe khaṇḍe dūre janeta na yāi | 89 |
se satī boilā se mohora bacanaku
atyanta bhagate nātha ādara karibe tuku | 90 |
lg.note: ẏemānaṁku kemante muṁ karibi ramaṇa |–cha, ja

lg.l: tanu mohinī ye amba kā citrarekhā | 91 |
satī boilā mora gaḷuta koṣṭhiā brāhmaṇa
tumbhanta icchākalā go se pūbongra ramaṇa | 92 |
mekhiḷikā beśyā boilā go āẏi tohora āgyāṁku
sammata karāi svatī galā nija bāsa
mahāghora andhāra rātra ye ghora baraṣaṇa
kāndhare basāi satī beśyā gharaku niai brāhmaṇa | 95 |
baitaraṇī nabī ye pacchima kaicchāḍa taṭe
māṇḍabya maharuṣi śūḷe basichanti tahiṁra nikaṭe | 96 |
gokarṇṇikā tīrthe mīna goṭiẏe śūḷadei māileka pūbonge
tadadoṣe śūḷare se māḍi bsichanti ẏebe | 97 |
andhāra kāḷe sundarī gamai begi begi
se brāhmaṇa caraṇa māṇḍabya ruṣiśire lāgi | 98 |
boile śūḷe basilāra chāḷai mote kere | 99 |
patibhagatā boilā nātha kāhiṁki āra yiba | 102 |
svāmī yebe śira cchedana hoiba raẏeṇī pāhile | 103 |
bhrathānta ārohī tahiṁ sūryyakaiṁ kalā tusta
ude thaja nohibu tu chāẏāde pati | 104 |
yadyapi hoibu ude mohora bola aprityāgi
mohora svāmī prāẏe tu hua koṣṭha rogī | 106 |
sapata dibasa sapata rātra udaẏe nohile
muhiṁ ude hoi nuārai satīra mahākope | 110 |
brahmāẏe boile ādityaṁku kiṁpe kopakalu māẏe
sacarācara nāśa yāucchiṭi āditya aṇa udaẏe | 112 |
svatī boile se ude nohukinā dinā
śira pachake cchedana hou tohora svāmīra | 114 |
tu tāhā piṇḍa gheni dahana hoa agni
se ruṣira śāpya dropatī go catrahuṁ baḷilā | 117 |
svāmīra piṇḍa gheni svatī paśiā anaḷe | 118 |
aśvamedha ghr̥ta gheni dahana kale kāẏe
se pāuṁśa guḍāka beni locikari ghenile debataẏe | 119 |
tirīẏeka puruṣeka kale beni ye pituḷī
mr̥tu sañjībanī mantra amr̥ta dei toḷi | 120 |
cetanā pāi uṭhile yehne nidrāgata prāṇī jāṇi
nakṣatra hoi udaẏe hoile se saptaruṣiṁkara pāśe | 123 |
patibratā hoile go puṇya hoai ẏeḍe | 124 |
svāmīre bhagati hoile ẏesaneka pyṇya yatha | 125 |
anīti saṁsā ra ẏe bichāra nohe kicchi
nāśakara debatā se aneka doṣa bācchi | 126 |
svāmī sebāhuṁ stirīṁka na diśai āna puṇya
svāmī aṭe deba dharma svāmī ye debatā
svāmī aṭe nārāẏaṇa svāmī ye tīrthayātrā | 128 |
ādianta kicchi nāhiṁ baẏasa mattagabong madhye
ẏeṇu se pāpa bardhuta hoai lubudhe | 130 |
lg.note: lubudhe–lobha |
lg.l: baẏasa sarile se bichāra nohe kicchi
kiñchita doṣare go bahuta pāpa acchi | 131 |
madhya baẏasa khiṇḍika bichāra kara puṇa
nija prabhma prasāde go upujai kāraṇa | 132 |
tumbhe bola ẏehā abā bañchibā kemante
gyāṁna na buḍāi go śāhāsra kathā śuṇa
saṁsāra sagaruṁ tarikuṭi nāba ẏe śrī biṣṇu | 134 |
śūdramuni sāroḷā sāsa kahile patibratā tirī bāratā | 136 | | 11642 |
lg.head:
{@tripuramohinī haraṇa o meruśūḷa
badha kathā@}

lg.l: pañcha indri mohinī go tu aṭu parama yogeśvarī | 4 |
yemante gopyāne go dina hoaiṭi pāri
ẏehenneka kari tumbhe cittare thiba dhari | 5 |
dropatī pratiuttara dile mārakaṇḍa bākya śuṇi |
pāṇḍabahuṁ bhagati mora nāhiṁ āne bāṇī | 6 |
mote ye icchiba se heba khaṇḍa tni | 7 |
bābhiẏe chāriheṁ gopya hoi pārantini bhale
tore bihune sṁbatsare āmbhe bañchibu kesane | 12 |
āṣya ārogya hoi barddhuta hoiba yathā
pañcha kaṭaka prāpti tote hou ye sarbathā | 13 |
hariṁki saṁketa sumaraṇā tu karaho bahani | 17 |
śrī bāsudeba ye yujheṣṭhi debaṁku dekhi
svāmī, tohora parasāde samaste achanti kṣama | 25 |
tu deba mahārājā aṭu dharma yujheṣṭhi
byāse boile tohore cintā na kale
ẏeḍe baḍa durgatiru araṇye kemante bañchile | 27 |
byāse boile hari ẏe bañchile araṇye
ābaa acchi baṛhā baraṣe te rahine | 29 |
ẏe puṇa dharmanta na chāḍiba yugate
yujheṣṭhi debe boile ẏekathā aṭaiṭi sata
ẏehu araṇyakaiṁ muṁ puṇa bujhuacchi sustha | 34 |
tāhāra tahiṁki bhaẏe loke nāhiṁ yāẏe
ẏe gopya hoi pāranti jenābaḷī pāṭaṇe | 42 |
bhala gopyathāna acchi se mandara nikaṭe | 43 |
mandara gandahma rddana lokāloki giri piḍhā
madhye rājya karai se meruśuḷa mahabīrā | 44 |
ratha gaja aśva tāra nāhiṁ sanya thāṭha
sahasreka kanyā gheni thāi se drapiṣṭha | 45 |
gopyāna hoi pāriba se male ẏekajaṇe | 46 |
amara purakaiṁ se meruśuḷa diẏe dhāḍi
anubrate thai se sampāti piṭhi caṛhi | 47 |
dhanugadā khaḍaga se na dharai hāthe
merūśūḷa bolikari se aṭai kebaṇa baṁśī | 49 |
baiśisṭhe boiel ho ananta datya putra
tāhāra tahuṁ jāta puṇa helā japāśūḷa
jagujitā putreka hou bara se mgila | 59 |
bhoḷeṇa prasanna hele se birañchi daibrata
tahuṁ se putaka tāhāra hoila utapatti | 61 |
tāhara sārikṣe na pailā rāẏe bara
se bhmabane thoile nei se trabhmabana mohinīki
ẏekasare thai se kehi na yāi tāhāra tahiṁki | 66 |
śrabaṇā nāme nakṣatra bhoga se dinara | 68 |
bāḷaba nāme kraṇa śūḷa nāme yoga
bahuta kalyāṇa āśiṣa tāku kaleka dr̥bhāsā
boile āẏi go siddha heu tohora manīṣā | 71 |
mote bara gotiẏe ṭhābakara kinā dr̥bhāsā mahāmuni | 72 |
ādhāriru kāḍhile muni citra ye paṭaḷa | 73 |
boile, mātā ẏehāra pābongtī pitā ye dhūrujati | 74 |
ābara kāmakaiṁ dahana kariṇa ẏehā īśvara kale jāẏe
pratakṣe sundara ẏe anaṅga teja prāẏe | 75 |
mahā anaḷa bhedi utapatta ẏe kumāra
chaḍabadana dvādaśa bhmaja dvādaśa ye netra
aneka puṇya yebe tu kariachu pubonge
praśu kuṭhara ye pinākī nāme dhanu
bho mahatamā se puruṣakaiṁ bheṭāiba mote | 83 |
dr̥bhāsā boile yebe icchā tora tribhmabana mohinī
ẏehī sapata dibasa madhye muṁ āsibaiṁ tāhākaiṁ gheni | 84 |
tejili pitāmātā muni he tohore śaraṇa
bhagatajana macchaḷa tumbhe tāhā bahana kariāṇa | 85 |
dr̥bhasaẏe boile āẏi āmbhe para dukhe dukhī
tu aneka bhoga bhmañjibu go śarada candramukhī | 86 |
pāṇḍabaṁka baḷe ki se marai meruśūḷa | 89 |
yujheṣṭhi deba boile bābu śuṇare sahadeba
sahadeba boile deba hoiba bahuta kathā
arjuna ṭhākuraṁka hāthe tāhāra mr̥tu yathā | 91 |
mārakaṇḍe boile sahadeba mantrī bacana śuṇi
anya antara kathā ẏethi hoiba ki puṇi | 92 |
bahuta dvandva ye hoiba ẏehi parastāpu | 93 |
dr̥bhāsā gale tribhmabana mohinī citrapaṭa gheni
tāhāku bara nimante āsiba kārttikeśara gheni | 96 |
se kathā niphaḷa hoiba pāiba baḍalāja | 97 |
citrapaṭa dekhāi tumbhe bhaṇḍila bāḷuta kumārī
se tribhmabana mohinīki kārttikeśvara manara hīāḷi | 98 |
pādare gaḷai tāra gaḷuta kuṣṭha byādhi | 99 |
dr̥bhāsā boile nārade ho na kaha ẏemanta bāṇī
se kanyā mana karicchi āmbhara bola śuṇi | 102 |
ẏeṇe nārade bege yāiṁ kanyaku bheṭile | 103 |
aneka bhagati se ye meruśūḷara kumārī
pradāna nakalā mote hoili āsi yubā | 106 |
manasija mohana se lakṣmī nārāẏaṇaṁkara baḷā | 111 |
stambhana mohana mādana baśa uccāṭana pañchu śara
bho muni nārade tote śate sahasra daini
ẏe mohora svamīki āsa bege gheni | 114 |
kahiṇa nārada gale ākaśa pura bhrami
manapabana daṇḍa ārohi se dvārikāpura gami | 118 |
āsiba ṭiki padmana se śambara airi | 121 |
ẏehikṣaṇi bije karibe manumathe nārada saṅgate | 122 |
bābu tuhi se biḷasantā pabitra garuhaṁsī | 123 |
padmana boilā muni he yibāka ẏehikṣaṇa
nārade boile tu ẏete biḷamba kahu |
kārttikeśvara aile tote prāpata hoiba kāhuṁ | 126 |
bābu tinibhmabana madhye se kanyāku nāhiṁ samasari
rasāṇa pratimā prāẏe lalāṭa rekha pāṭi
lalāṭa taḷe ye bhr̥bhaṅgī roma rañchi
kāmadebara dhanu ki thoicchi nei sañchi | 131 |
kiñchite chāhiṁle puruṣa tuṭai nija prāṇa | 132 |
teṇukari dabana se na chāhiṁi toḷi | 134 |
ghaṭaṇa tiḷaphula prāẏe aṭe tāra nāsā
hasi bacana kahile bratiba kebaṇa puruṣa | 135 |
pabana bikāre caḷanti beni ye śrabaṇe
bhārā hoiba boli na bahai kaṇaẏa ghaṭaṇe | 140 |
nohoi sagkīrṇṇa se ye nohoi baḍa ucca | 143 |
surabhi pākhuḍā prāẏe diśai tāra piṭhi
kaṇaẏa stambha yehne olaṭa rāma kadaḷī
anaṅga bhaṇḍāra kundara kari thoiacchi abā | 155 |
tribhmabana mohai tara thana beni dekhante
ẏekādine kaḷe se ye candramā sampūrṇṇa
samasta guṇe lakṣaṇa se aṭai guṇabantī
tathi uparaku bhārā aṭe kuca ye yugaḷa | 161 |
ẏe mahābhārākaiṁ ye majhā tāra kṣīnna
na puṇa tuṭai sehu bāta bighāteṇa | 162 |
atikṣīṇa majhā tāra paḍile yiba tuṭi |
puṇi ketekāḷe dhātā sijiba se pratimā goṭi | 164 |
hema śiśire ye tapada tāra kāẏe
se stirī nāẏa kātu puruṣa ratnakānti
bābu dvārikāku aḷaṁkāra yugate aṭai sehi
tenyāẏuṁ pradyugna ho bege ailu tote kahi | 169 |
biśeṣe birahītā tote se paśilā śaraṇa
se stirī nāẏi kāku tu bahana kari āṇa | 170 |
kāmoda sarthiki boilā sāja mora ratha | 173 |
puṣyaka rathe ārohaṇa kalā śrīkr̥ṣṇara tanu | 174 |
kāmoda sārathi se ākāśe ratha bāhi
āge kaḷahapriẏa muni bāṭa ye kaḍhāi | 175 |
yujheṣṭhi bhīma arjuna nakuḷa sahadeba ādikari | 176 |
nāradaṁka tule dekha deba padmana bijekalā | 177 |
puṣyeka ratha tejyākalāka bīra ye padmana | 178 |
koḷakari dhari mukhe cumbana dile yujheṣṭhi debasvāmī | 179 |
dhanya tu parama paṇḍita gata āgata jāṇu sabongā | 180 |
tāhāra nimante āmbhe padmanakaiṁ yāuachuṁ gheni | 182 |
niẏata tapī paṇḍita tīrtha prāpata dharma maitra
pantita bhigyaṁloke ẏehā na karanti paritejyā | 186 |
jagannāthe boile muni he padmanaku gheniyāa
se kanyāra tule ẏehāku meḷe ye karāa | 188 |
yemante padmanaku bhajāi se kanyā ẏekā
mahīndrabeḷe nei padmanaku se kanyākaiṁ dekhā | 189 |
tāhāṁkara tule padma nare na kariba dvanda | 190 |
nāhiṁ nohiba paṭāntara svargamañcha pātāḷa puratini | 194 |
asura bhaẏe tahiṁkai kehi nuāranti gami | 195 |
tote se bahuta icchā kalāka sundarī
uṭha ho kārttikeśvara chāla yibā bege bijekari | 196 |
tu ye āmbhanta bābu sadakaru mānanā
bho deba dr̥bhāsāṁka āge se kahilā sandeśa
boilā kārttikeśvarakaiṁ muni he bege gheniāsa | 200 |
kārttikeśvara boilā svāmī yācilāra kanyā ye rañchilā bhojana
īśvare boile tumbhe yāa yā dr̥bhāsā
kanya kaiṁ gheni tumbhe bahana gheniāsa | 202 |
śuṇiṇa kumara ye sananda hoilāka mane
kārttikeśvara boile muni he meruśūḷa tahiṁki chālayibā
bābu ẏe tohora dohitā ye tribhmabana mohinī
tāhāra nimante āmbhe kārttikeśvarakaiṁ ailu ye gheni | 209 |
śuṇiṇa sānanda se ye meruśūḷa rājā
kārttikeśvara prāẏe jāmatā prāpata heli ẏebe | 212 |
puṇyanidhi prapata hoilā āsi hoilāka mora āga | 213 |
nabare bijaẏe ye karāilā rājā nei | 216 |
tāhāṁka madhye mukhyapāna mātāṅgī boli mudusulī | 217 |
māgo dia āmbhanta badhāi aneka sambhare | 219 |
māgo dutī īśvara aṭanti yebaṇa kārttikakumara
tārakā bidhvaṁsana se tāku nāhiṁ paṭāntara | 220 |
se tote kāli ye hoibe go bibhā
kahi ye gale mote kaḷahapriẏa muni
mīnaketana svāmīki mora naile ta gheni | 223 |
śarīra khaṇḍa khaṇḍa kariba ṣaḍabadana gheni | 225 |
he durge nārāẏaṇī go pūrāa manīṣā
mane cintākalā debī rakha mote umā | 228 |
jaẏatu mātāṅgī go bhabānī kāmakṣā kāmaseṇā
śumbha niśumbha mohinī go aṭu mahāmāẏe
bīraghaṇṭa chāmara tu kalu māta kṣaẏe | 230 |
bāḷuta kheḍakāḷe go bārānidhi kalu caḷu | 233 |
māgo nāradaṁka bacane muṁ pratiāśa kali
kāḷe aprāpata mote houcchi go māẏe
ki abā bāṭe muniṁki paḍilā apacaẏe | 235 |
tu mote prasanna go hoasi kāmakṣī
stirīliṅga bedanāku go hoa mote sākṣī | 236 |
baśya uccāṭana stambhana mohana goṭika añjana
tuhi se jāṇu māgo samasta bidhāna | 238 |
gobindara nandana ye padmana mora bara
tāṁka binu ānacitte na baḷai mora | 239 |
śūdramuni sāroḷo dāsa śatadaṇḍa praḷamba taba padmapāda tale | 240 |
bahuta binoẏī hoi boilā yahuṁ meruśūḷara dulāḷī
padmanahuṁ āne mane na bhāḷai hiāḷī | 241 |
caturtha daṇḍa thāuṁ prabeśa mīnalagna beḷā
pāpagraha nāhiṁ ye nakara tumbhe heḷā | 244 |
kārttikeśvara tribhmabana mohinī yemante pūroi manīṣā | 246 |
kanyākaiṁ ahigyaṁ stāne nia boli kahile dr̥bhāsā maharuṣi | 148 |
kre dīpābaḷī gheni maṅgaḷa gābanti kāminī | 249 |
bīratūra ṭamaka ḍhola niśāṇa bājai dāuṇḍi
prathama dante ye prabeśa hoilā rāti
śrīkare ratna ātañjāni gheni aṣṭaratna kośa | 255 |
śutilā sundarī ye daṇḍa pralambita hi | 256 |
boilā mātā go prasanna huasi abhaẏe
mana kāmanā nimante muhiṁ tote khaṭi
bāẏeñcchā prāpata kara go triguṇa guṇa heṭi | 258 |
yābata jībe māta go āitaba cintā
gobindara nandana go ballabha hou mora | 260 |
muhiṁ debī icchākali go samasta parityāgī | 261 |
prasanne aparṇṇā go mote hoasi baradātrī | 262 |
muhiṁ tohore śaraṇa mote uddhara gosāmaṇi | 263 |
bahuta ajaẏe go yāhāku sumarante bipada hoẏe khaṇḍi
bhagatajana macchaḷī go śaraṇa maṅgaḷa caṇḍī | 264 |
taba padmapāde māgo mohora bhagati anubrate
śrīkr̥ṣṇa nandana mīnaketanakaiṁ baradāna deā mote | 265 |
īśāna koṇe śubhilā se jhiṭipiṭi raḍi | 268 |
śūnye śubhilā yāa tu sundarī padmana bhāriyā huasi | 271 |
beni naẏana bhedilā padmana rūpa dekhi
hā hā nātha boli ārate śubhrakeśī
benibhmaje koḷakari kaṭimekhaḷāku jānu bhiḍi basi | 277 |
rathe nei padmana basāilā koḷāgrata kari | 280 |
hāndoḷa acchi ye tahiṁ kanyā puṇa nāhiṁ
kimbhūta māẏeā helā ẏethu kanyā galā kāhiṁ | 282 |
kanyāra rūpaguṇa dekhi abā harile gandhabonge
śuṇiṇa se asureśvaraku na phurai kicchi
adabhūte ke nelāre samasta acha rakṣī | 285 |
bolai kere adabhūte harila moha yubatī
rāgeṇa kārttikeśvara ghenilā śūḷa ye śakati | 287 |
nārade boile bābu śuṇa ho anaṅga
kāmākṣī debīṁkara deuḷa sannidhyare yāiṁ bheṭi | 291 |
dr̥bhāsāṁku dekhi pūcchākale kaḷi ye katara
hajilā drabya parāẏeta kisa tumbhe loḍa | 292 |
tumbhanta āmbhe yāhā kahithiluṁ yāuṁ yāuṁ bāṭe | 293 |
tāhā nimante ailu āmbhe kārttikeśvarakaiṁ gheni | 294 |
kehi na dekhile se kanyā keṇe gala antarddhāne | 296 |
lg.note: loḷa = doḷa mukuṭa |

lg.l: jātaka yātrāyoge tumbhe anakūḷa na gaṇa | 296 |
jātaka yātrāyoge tumbhe anakūḷa na gaṇa | 297 |
digabije karai ye kumāra śaẏambaa airi | 299 |
padmanara kaṇṭhe lambāilā sundarī baraṇamāḷā goṭi | 301 |
boilā bho nātha muṁ tohore śaraṇa
tu mohora ballabha ho muṁ tohore kalāiṁ baraṇa | 303 |
saṅge thāṭha sainya nāhiṁ sabonge ẏekā
āmbhe dekhi ailuṁ kanyā gheni galāni dvārikā | 305 |
āja se dvarikā pura muṁ pakāibi bhāñji | 307 |
tohora kayā nemāku āne darpa kāhāra | 308 |
niḷendī kanyā haraṇa prāẏe helā bābu
śrīkr̥ṣṇa nandanaṁku ye tu mārithil sabu | 309 |
se kathā pāśora ki galā tāra manuṁ
ẏebe to bhāriyāku padmana harila jāṇuṁ jāṇuṁ | 310 |
dhika dhika kārttika tora ṣaḍa ye badana
īśvara nandaa tu tora nārī hariniẏe āna | 312 |
agyāne bāḷutapaṇe padmana kalāka ẏeḍe kr̥tya
nāraẏana dekhante ẏehā ke sahibāra yugata | 314 |
bibhā hoilā kanyā tote kalāka abiśvāsa | 315 |
sāmanya kathā sina śuṇibāku baḍa lajjā
bibhā hoilā ṭhābaru āna nelā to bhāriya | 316 |
ẏete boli ṭaha ṭaha hasile mahāmuni
ẏeḍe biḍambaṇa kalā se meruśūḷara nandanī | 317 |
trilokye kārttika tote hoilā ẏeḍe lāja
ki boli bolibe tote debādhi debarāja | 318 |
padmana ye galā tribhmabana mohinīkaiṁ gheni
baḷāṅgī nadīkūḷe bheṭilā hari arjuna beni | 321 |
kanyāku dekhi deba karanti dhani dhani
bābure dvārikā maṇḍaṇi ẏe ailu kanyā gheni | 323 |
asura thāṭha palāṇile āmbhe ogāḷuṁ sina tāhāṁku | 324 |
kanyā gheni padmana galā dvārābatī purī | 325 |
maḷaẏā pabongte hari arjuna chanti rahi
kārttika kare dhariacchi amoha śakati śūḷa
mandara biṁjhagiri duheṁ ki āsuchanti uṭhi
dekhanti pabongte thāiṁ śrīkr̥ṣṇa ye kirīṭī | 329 |
bainetra pithire bijaẏe deba ye gobinde
meruśūḷa rahilā kare kodāḷa āẏudha dhari | 331 |
meruśūḷa uparaku śasra bindhai kare gheni | 338 |
śasra paḍante arjuna śarīre na bhedī
se pabongte upare chanti jagannātha phālaguni
kodāḷa gheniṇa se durānteka rakṣasa pratyakṣa
puṇa puṇa prahāra ye kalāi meruśūḷa
se śahasra asura kare dhāiṁ gheni | 352 |
puṇi phālaguni ye pabongtā śasra māri
se mahā anaḷaśara dānaba garbhare saṅghari | 355 |
se kodāḷa āẏudhare beṇṭa dilā bhari | 358 |
meruśūḷa boile svāmī dutī ye īśvara
tāhāku samāna ye nohe to samara | 360 |
samare na ghuñchile se mohora śaraghāte
śarīra kampai mora tāṁka śara bighāte | 361 |
ubhā hoiṇa samara dekha mohora āja | 362 |
puṇa samare saja hoile kārttike meruśūḷa
hari arjuna achanti tamāḷa taru br̥kṣataḷa | 363 |
arjuna boile svāmī kārttika tule yujha
kārttikeśvarakaiṁ gheni maẏūra paḍilā yojana sāta | 366 |
daṇḍa kodaṇḍa gheni samare āsi paśi | 367 |
ẏekā pādakare ye śate yojana kṣepi
pāpuṇya dui gyānare kicchi hiṁ na bichāri
ahigyaṁ sthānaru re kanyā nela chorilari | 374 |
śuśupāḷa bibhākāḷe yehne hari āṇilu rukmaṇī
beḷe beḷe tumbhemāne kara ye cauryya
goḷakuṇḍā pāṇḍabe ye ẏe tohora sākhā
āja kehu rakṣākari pāri ẏe tohora dvārikā | 377 |
kr̥ṣṇā pāṇṭaba ke rakṣā kariye pāribā | 379 |
apāra durdharṣa bacana re tu bolu mattagabonte | 380 |
na cetanti parāpra ẏe huanti icchāẏeṇa bari | 381 |
na icchiba śr̥ṅgāra ye yoga paramāda | 383 |
bāte kadaḷīpatra jāṇi kampai tāra aṅga
bahuta dvanda hoile nohiba kāryya kicchi | 390 |
svāmī āmanta rāi kārttikeśvarakaiṁ barila kumarī
ahigyāṁ sthānuṁ padmana kanyāu miḷilāka āsi | 394 |
mūrcchāgata hoiṇa se sāta yojanare paḍi | 398 |
kareṇa tīkṣa triśūḷe trāṇa ye pināka
medinī uchuḷai ye bahinī śadda(?) ḍāka | 402 |
dekhi parama sāndana hoile prabhma debarāja | 403 |
jita mahāprasāda ho uṭha uṭha jinarddana | 408 |
batiśa sahasra kanyā kare gheniṇa arghyasthāḷī
nārade kahile yāiṁ śuṇa ho baḷarāma
sabonge ẏekā achanti se kr̥ṣṇa phālaguni | 414 |
ahibrateka śārdduḷa yociṇa dhāmanti rāmaṁka pachakati | 417 |
yadubongśa bhojabongśa haihaẏa bongśa kurubaḷa bongśa
samarthaka haḷa bulāI dhāmanti deba haḷī
tinipadma bhārā pari saunanda bahai abiśrāma | 423 |
re re kāra śabade rāma dile ẏekāḍāke
mahāśānti bacane bhajile śrī baḷarāmaṁka paẏara | 425 |
svāmī ahrihara samara ẏebe houacchi sāmya | 426 |
tu ẏebe kopa saṅharaṇa kara debahaḷī
śānti bhajileni rudra nakale kicchi kaḷi | 427 |
tumbhara putraku paṭhiāi tāhaku niāilu banamāḷī
ẏeheneka aniryyāpa kimpe karilu toho bhaḷi | 430 |
gobinde boilā svāmī na kahibāka mote
se kanyā nāradaṁku paṭhiāilā padmana nimante | 431 |
svāmī muhiṁ yebe hāde jāṇithānti ẏethira tadanta
svāmī ẏebeheṁ samarpaṇa karanti se kanyā
bichāri parameśa deba kopa karibā sāmya | 434 |
bābu birahītā kanyā sehu kalāka baḍamanda
āmbhe harihara ẏekaātmā karibā kiṁpe dvanda | 438 |
ārambhe thilā se meruśū ḷara mūrati
mūṣaḷa paḍante tāra duguṇa teja kānti | 443 |
puṇa puṇa prahāra kale rāma bajrahaḷe
re re kāra śabade dhāmaiṁ meruśūḷa
mandara giri jāṇi aṅge āsi paḍi
puṇi dhāmante se kope bīra meruśūḷa
se suda śeṇa cakra ye paḍilā datyakāẏe
asureśvara yahuṁ kodāḷa śara prahāra kari
āre raha raha boli dhāiṁlā dhanurjaẏe | 457 |
datyara dehe paḍi śahasre hoile śatecūnā | 458 |
khaṇḍigiri prāẏe hoi rome romake rudhira gaḷi | 460 |
svāmī yebaṇa kāḷe pitāṁku ẏe māgiacchi bara
chāriheṁ samare ye nohibe mote sari | 465 |
chāra digapāḷe yebe mānuṣye hebe abatāra | 466 |
gobinde boile ẏe ta hoilā niṣphaḷa | 467 |
yujheṣṭhi deba āśrija ey sahadeba bacane
āre bābu bhīmasena yāa yā bahana
chāri digapāḷe ẏekā hoi arjuna hoiacchi jāta | 471 |
svāmi brahmāṁkara śira ye īśvara bibhūti

lg.note:
“tebe se prāṇatyāja hoiba meruśūḷa”–
ehi pādānta pare “kha” pothire pātha :–
ẏesaneka bara pāiacchi meruśūḷa
teṇu kari samare se aṭe achāgaḷa |
sahadebara mukhuṁ ẏesaneka bākya śuṇi
stambhībhūta hoile ye deba catrapāṇi |
chāri digapāḷe nohibe ẏekā jaṇe |–cha, kha, ña
lg.l: brahma kapāḷa ye hara kare lāgiacchi
īśvare boile śaraṇa rakha he śrībacchi | 474 |
īśvara bikaḷe hari catra gheni bāmahasta
se rudhira paḍilā yāiṁ brahmāra kapāḷe
tāhāra nāmagoṭi ye hari dileka praśasta | 477 |
śasra nāme dhātāra tahuṁ helā jāẏe
ẏemante sahasre baraṣa beniṁka samara hoilā
kehi na jiṇilā samare kehu ta na hārila | 479 |
teṇu samara ruhāile deba biṣṇu nātha
dvāpara yuge tumbhe mānuṣye hoa jāta | 480 |
āditye saṅharile dvāpare mānabe jāta karṇṇa | 481 |
harihara brahma śarīru yebaṇa puruṣa utapanna
bāsabe saṅharile se dvāpare jāta arajuna | 482 |
chāri digapāḷaṭi ẏe ẏekā bīra phālaguni | 483 |
tebe meruśūḷa bahda jāṇa hoibāka ẏebe | 484 |

lg.note: sahadeba boile tumbhe śuṇa rāma kr̥ṣṇa beni | ta, ṇa, ja, ca, jha, na, gha, ṭha

lg.l: nīḷabāṇa bhmajabaṇa boliṇa yebaṇa bāṇa beni
kaṣṭhore basaile guṇare tāhā pāṇḍaba phālaguni | 488 |
ananta rudra abatāra se aṭanti benibāṇa
yāhākaiṁ peiṣiba se nāśa karibaṭi sañchaẏe
arjuna āgyāṁ dilā se yāa bāṇa beni
oañchu koti kiraṇa dui sadvasra jyoti

lg.note: “samare nibhaẏā bāsabara bāḷa” ehi pādānta pare “kha” pithire adhikā pāṭha :–
baiṣṇabī catraku pātha nija kare gheni
kope bulāilā tāhā bīra phālauni |
mantriṇa peṣante catra caḷe antarāḷa
dekhi meruśūḷa bege pātilā kodāḷa |
paḍila baiṣṇabī catra hoilā paracaṇḍa
meruśūḷara kodāḷa hila benikhaṇḍa |
śūnyahasta hoilā se daitya meruśūḷa
beni mūtha uñchāiṇa se dhāẏe niśācara |
paśupatra śaraku dhailā bīra pātha
dhanure basaiṇa se peṣilā turita |
koṭiẏe kibaṇa aṭe se paśupatra jyoti
caḷante pātāle kampu acchi basumatī |

lg.l: śūnya puruṣe rahi nuārile gagana maṇḍaḷe | 493 |
āditya debatā ye yāiṁ merū uhāḍe lucile
pabana debātā sahite kehi rahi nuārile | 494 |
bhaẏe niśācara se kodāḷa āẏudha pāti
kodāḷa dahijya hoilā nīḷabāṇa bhmajabāṇa jyoti | 495 |
khaṇḍeka biṁjhamāḷa jāṇi paḍilā bhūmi māḍi | 498 |
sādhu sādhu arjuna boli śubhalaka dhuni | 499 |
mānabe jāta hoi mahimāṁ toa dhani | 501 |
brahmā rudra indra samaste yāhākaiṁ hāri

lg.note: nārāja āsanteṇa se kampile digapāḷe |–ka, na, cha, gha, na
pabana debatā sahite śūnyamaṇḍaḷe lucile |–ka
pabana debatā sahite kehi pheri nuārle |–ṇa, na, ṭha, kha

bhujabāna paḍilā yāiṁ daitya nābhisthaḷe
nīḷabāṇa paḍilā yāiṇa bakṣasthaḷe |–ṇa, na, ka, ṭha
khaṇḍagiri biṁjhagiri jāṇi paḍilā muhiṁmāḍi |
pr̥thī mukharu rudhira bahai chālile |–ḍa, ña, ṇa

lg.l: jaḷe sthaḷe anaḷe deba āna nahiṁ kehi
pr̥thī āpa teja bāiba ākāśa deba tuhi | 508 |

lg.note:
tohora prasāde sinā meruśūḷa hata
kṣetrībara pratagyāṁ sādu sādhu bīra pātha |–ka, ña

tohora prasāde nibartta galā puṇa sehi
tinipure pratagyāṁ sādhu sādhu bīra tuhi |–ja, ca, jha
“tohore rakṣāgalā pātāḷa mañcha ākaśa” pāṭha pare “ṭa” pothire adhika pāṭha :–
tetiśakoṭi debe arjunaku binaẏe
toṣe baḷarāmaṁku arjuna karai laẏe |
nīḷa nīḷa rucira nīḷāmbara udita kāma |–ka, ja
nīḷāmbara puruṣa tu nīḷabarṇṇa śyāma |–kha, ṇa, ṭa, na
nīḷagiri śarīra udita kamapāḷa nāma |–jha
adabhmate prasanna puruṣa deba haḷī |–jha, ṭa, cha
adabhmate prasanma puruṣa deba śūḷī |–ṇa, kha, na

lg.l: śrīkr̥ṣṇara jyeṣṭha sodara śaṅkhara barṇṇa cihna | 512 |

yāmaḷā arjuna ye chāṇura hata keśī | 514 |

kapiḷāsa darpa dhvaṁsana nātha tu puruṣa abhaẏe | 516 |

lg.l: ẏe bhaba saṁsāre paḍi yauacchi bhāsi | 517 |
śrī kāma āma mohora śarīraku bjra sehā
kāraṇakaiṁ bhaba abhābagoṭi mote nei cinhā | 518 |
lobha moha saṁsāra ẏe kuṭumba rañchanā
kṣaṇa kṣaṇake anīti ẏe jaḷabimbu prāẏe sinā | 519 |
svāmī dekhu dekhu baṇā hoi paḍili jañjāḷe
ẏe trodhuṁ narāẏaṇa mote uddhara ẏetebeḷe | 520 |
śuṇiṇa kuṭumba jañjāḷaku mote lāgilā mahābhaẏe
ṣāṭhiẏe lakṣa purāṇaku ye hoiba bakatā
ākāśuṁ āṇidile mote siddha purāṇa pothi

lg.note: durāpada duṣakr̥ta aṭai mohaphāśī |–ja, ṇa, cha

lekhaṇa paṭhana yahuṁ śraddhā kari citta
se mahādebī mote karuṇā toṣa citta |–cha
lg.l: śabada kahila mora kuṭumba pari mukhe
chāḍimela manabhranti ẏeke lekhana kara sukeh | 527 |
mama hāthe dile āṇi lekhana goṭiẏe
ẏehā gheni yāha kahibu se hoiba śāstramaẏe | 528 |
na paḍhi paṇḍita muṁ na jāṇi śāstracāṇī
āpaṇe basi kahile bāḷuta bhaba gheni | 530 |
teṇu muhiṁ agyāne paśili agada sagara
svaẏeṁ yāhā mote kahi dianti sāroḷā
āgyāṁẏe śāhāstra ye ghaṭaṇa kala āṇi | 534 |
śrī caṇḍī sāroḷā caraṇe praṇapatya nitye
yama kāḷa bañchāi śuṇante yehu grantha | 536 |
sarasvatī sāhāne yehne chāḍai kaḷuṣa occha
pratyakṣe prāpata hoai dharma artha kāma mokṣa | 537 |
dhana santāna barddhuta hoai āraṇyakapabong śuṇante
āṣya barddhuta hoai āpada khaṇḍe nitye | 538 |
tribeṇī snāhāne ye ẏe nirmaḷa hoẏe pātra

lg.note: chāḍiṇa mana bhrānti ẏebe lekhana kara sukhe |–ṭa

lg.l: sabye asabye se kahai yeuṁ bāṇī
maudadhi uttara śvetagaṅgā taḷe kaḷapabaṭa nikaṭe
tahiṁ mama ātmā luḷu manatuṣṭe śrī jagannātha pāda puṭe | 544 |
